original: rgyud 'di las /

analyzed: dang po 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdud pa pos gleng ma bslang ba yin zhes dang por brgal ba la /

analyzed: de'i lan gdab pa'i phyir 'di skad du /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin par rab tu bstan pa yin no zhes zer te /

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /

original: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //

original: zhes smos pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes smos pa yin no //

original: gzhan dag ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud stong phrag brgya pa las btus pa yin pas /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud stong phrag brgya pa las btus pa yin pas /

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa dang por smos pa yin la /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa dang por smos pa yin la /
translated: so it is stated at the beginning, ‚ÄúThus it is said in the Root Tantra,‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'di ni de'i rgyud phyi ma yin pas ma smos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i rgyud phyi ma yin pas ma smos pa ma yin no //

original: de ni rgyud gzhan dag dang 'dres par 'gyur ba'i don gyi bye brag 'byed pa'i phyir bla ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni rgyud gzhan dag dang 'dres par 'gyur ba'i don gyi bye brag 'byed pa'i phyir bla ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is said that it is superior because it distinguishes the specific meanings that are mixed with other tantras.

original: gzhan dag ni bstan du med pa'i chos nyid kyis bstan par bya ba dang ston pa po gcig tu bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni bstan du med pa'i chos nyid kyis bstan par bya ba dang ston pa po gcig tu bstan pa yin te /
translated: Others say that it is taught as a single teaching of the inexpressible nature of the dharma and the teacher.

original: rgyud 'di la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyud 'di la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

original: de la dang po re zhig rjod pa dang / brjod par bya ba dang // 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa yod par mthong nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rnams kyang 'jug par @41b 'gyur te /üîΩde bas na de nyid ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de la dang po re zhig rjod pa dang / brjod par bya ba dang // 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa yod par mthong nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rnams kyang 'jug par @41b 'gyur te / de bas na de nyid ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas brtsams te /
translated: There, first of all, seeing that there is an expression, something to be expressed, a connection, a purpose, and a purpose of the purpose, those who follow the Dharma and are inclined to reflection will engage.üîΩTherefore, that very [tantra] is explained by the arrangement of the text beginning with then and so forth,

original: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bar gyis gzhung bkod pas bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bar gyis gzhung bkod pas bshad pa yin te /

original: de la brjod pa ni 'khor lo bde mchog ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la brjod pa ni 'khor lo bde mchog ces bya ba'o //
translated: There, the expression is called Chakrasamvara.

original: des gang brjod par bya ba dpal he ru ka dang / rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i rgyud kyi lus ni brjod par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: des gang brjod par bya ba dpal he ru ka dang / rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i rgyud kyi lus ni brjod par bya ba yin la /
translated: That which is to be expressed by that, the body of the tantra of the glorious Heruka, Vajravarahi, and so forth, is what is to be expressed.

original: brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa yin no zhes la la dag 'dod la /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa yin no zhes la la dag 'dod la /

original: gzhan dag ni thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa yin no zhes zer ro ;
analyzed: gzhan dag ni thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa yin no zhes zer ro ;
translated: Others say that the definition of the related is the entity of means and that which arises from the means.

original: / bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bya'i skye bo 'jug par mdzad pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa nas gsang dbang bskur ba'i bar ni dgos pa yin la /

translated: The purpose is the entrance into the mandala and so forth, up to the conferral of the secret empowerment, in order to engage the disciples.

original: de'i 'og tu dus phyis des 'bras bu thob pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dus phyis des 'bras bu thob pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa yin no //
translated: The purpose of the purpose is the attainment of the result by them at a later time.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi phrad kyi tshogs kyis rgyud phyi ma nyid du nges par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi phrad kyi tshogs kyis rgyud phyi ma nyid du nges par byed pa yin no //
translated: The collection of words beginning with ‚Äúthen‚Äù ascertains the tantra as the latter.

original: de yang de nas zhes bya bas ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de yang de nas zhes bya bas ni de ma thag pa ste /

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rjes thogs nyid la 'og nas bshad pa 'di bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rjes thogs nyid la 'og nas bshad pa 'di bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: Immediately after the Tantra Equal to Space, this should be explained, as it is said.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rim pa dang rgyu'i don te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rim pa dang rgyu'i don te /
translated: Therefore means in order and for the sake of the cause.

original: de'i 'og tu zhes gsal ba nyid du smras pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu zhes gsal ba nyid du smras pa'o //

original: da nas kyi sgra smos pa ni bkra shis pa'i don te /
analyzed: da nas kyi sgra smos pa ni bkra shis pa'i don te /

original: bkra shis pa la sogs pa bstan bcos kyi dang por tshig tu brjod pa ni nyan pa po rnams kyi bgegs bsal bar bya ba yin pa'am //
analyzed: bkra shis pa la sogs pa bstan bcos kyi dang por tshig tu brjod pa ni nyan pa po rnams kyi bgegs bsal bar bya ba yin pa'am //
translated: The statement at the beginning of the treatise, auspiciousness, and so on, is for the sake of dispelling obstacles for the listeners, or

original: dbang du byed pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: dbang du byed pa'i don yin no //
translated: for the sake of subjugating them.

original: de bas na snga ma'i rang bzhin la ltos nas //
analyzed: de bas na snga ma'i rang bzhin la ltos nas //
translated: Therefore, in dependence on the previous nature,

original: bkra shis pa'am dbang byed yin //
analyzed: bkra shis pa'am dbang byed yin //
translated: it is auspicious or subjugating.

original: smras yin de nas de phyir sgra //
analyzed: smras yin de nas de phyir sgra //
translated: Said is the word then,

original: bstan bcos go rims rgyu yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos go rims rgyu yin no //
translated: the order of the treatise is the cause.

original: zhes so // 'o na bshad pa de ci zhig yin zhe na /üîΩgsang ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes so // 'o na bshad pa de ci zhig yin zhe na / gsang ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Now, what is that explanation?üîΩSecret is stated.

original: gsang ba ni sba bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: gsang ba ni sba bar bya ba ste /
translated: Secret is to be concealed.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa gzhan dag la bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa gzhan dag la bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not to be taught to others, such as the ≈õrƒÅvakas.

original: yang na thabs dang shes rab gcig tu byas pas bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'o //
analyzed: yang na thabs dang shes rab gcig tu byas pas bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'o //
translated: Or else, that which is to be accomplished by means of method and wisdom combined is the secret.

original: yang na rdo rje dang padma dang byang chub kyi sems de gsum po 'di dag ni gsang ba ste /üîΩra ni rdo rje @42a * //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje dang padma dang byang chub kyi sems de gsum po 'di dag ni gsang ba ste / ra ni rdo rje @42a * //
translated: Or else, these three‚Äîthe vajra, the lotus, and the bodhicitta‚Äîare the secret.

original: zhes byar bshad //
analyzed: zhes byar bshad //
translated: The syllable ra is explained as the vajra.

original: yi ge ha ni padmar bshad //üîΩde dag gnyis kyi sa bon ni //
analyzed: yi ge ha ni padmar bshad // de dag gnyis kyi sa bon ni //
translated: The syllable ha is explained as the lotus.

original: sya zhes bya bar bshad pa yin //
analyzed: sya zhes bya bar bshad pa yin //

original: zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: It is said.

original: yi ge ra ni rdo rje rtse mo 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge ra ni rdo rje rtse mo 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The syllable ra is like the tip of the vajra.

original: ha ni 'dab chags kyi mchu 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha ni 'dab chags kyi mchu 'dra ba'i phyir ro //

original: sa dang ya kun du sbyor ba ni gnyi ga'i sa bon gyi gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa dang ya kun du sbyor ba ni gnyi ga'i sa bon gyi gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The combination of sa and ya has the form of the seed of both.

original: de yang sa yan du sra ba na zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i tha ma gzung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de yang sa yan du sra ba na zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i tha ma gzung ba'i phyir te /
translated: Moreover, the ya is taken as the final syllable of ‚Äúhard‚Äù (sa),

original: de ni don dam pa'o //
analyzed: de ni don dam pa'o //
translated: which is the ultimate.

original: ji ltar bshad par bya ba gsal bar bstan pa ni mdor bsdus pa ste zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar bshad par bya ba gsal bar bstan pa ni mdor bsdus pa ste zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The clear teaching of how it is to be explained is ‚Äúin brief,‚Äù as it is said.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las ni shin tu rgyas par smos pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las ni shin tu rgyas par smos pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The Tantra Equal to Space mentions it in great detail, it is thought.

original: don de nyid gsal bar bstan pa ni rgyas pa min zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: don de nyid gsal bar bstan pa ni rgyas pa min zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The clear teaching of just that meaning is ‚Äúnot extensive,‚Äù as it is said.

original: yang na mdor bsdus pa ma yin gyi rgyas pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: yang na mdor bsdus pa ma yin gyi rgyas pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Or else, it is not brief, but ‚Äúextensive,‚Äù as it is said.

original: 'dir dgos pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir dgos pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Here, the purpose is this.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud ni gzhung rgyas pa yin la //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud ni gzhung rgyas pa yin la //
translated: The Tantra Equal to Space is extensive in its text.

original: 'dir ni don rgyas pa yin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni don rgyas pa yin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Here, it is extensive in its meaning,

original: khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid du 'khor lo gsum bshad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid du 'khor lo gsum bshad par bya ba yin no //
translated: as it is to be explained that the three wheels are of the nature of the three realms.

original: da ni tshig bzhis gsang ba nyid kyi khyad par bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni tshig bzhis gsang ba nyid kyi khyad par bstan par bya ste /
translated: Now, the four words should teach the special secret.

original: dpal gyi sgra ni mchod pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: dpal gyi sgra ni mchod pa'i tshig go //
translated: The word ‚Äúglory‚Äù is a word of worship.

original: he ru ka zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'dir bcom ldan 'das bdag po'i mtshan te /
analyzed: he ru ka zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'dir bcom ldan 'das bdag po'i mtshan te /
translated: The term heruka is the name of the Lord, the Bhagavat, in this tantra.

original: dpal gtso bor gyur pa'i he ru ka ni dpal he ru ka'o //
analyzed: dpal gtso bor gyur pa'i he ru ka ni dpal he ru ka'o //
translated: The ≈õrƒ´ is the glorious, the principal heruka, and the heruka is the glorious heruka.

original: de'i yang dag sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje phag mo dang lhan cig ro gcig pa'i tshul gyis kun du 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: de'i yang dag sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje phag mo dang lhan cig ro gcig pa'i tshul gyis kun du 'khyud pa'o //
translated: His union is the embrace in the manner of a single taste with the Bhagavat's consort, VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´.

original: khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid du bcom ldan 'das he ru ka zhes bya ba yi ge gsum gyis ston pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid du bcom ldan 'das he ru ka zhes bya ba yi ge gsum gyis ston pa nyid yin no //
translated: The Bhagavat Heruka is the identity of the three realms, indicated by the three syllables.

original: chos thams cad ni rgyu dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni rgyu dang bral ba'o //
translated: All phenomena are free from causes.

original: chos thams cad ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: All phenomena are free from conceptualization.

original: chos thams cad ni gang na yang mi gnas pa'o zhes pa ni mi dmigs pa'i yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni gang na yang mi gnas pa'o zhes pa ni mi dmigs pa'i yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid yin no //
translated: All phenomena do not abide anywhere. These are the three syllables of non-apprehension.

original: yang na dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba ni khyad par du bya ba'i tshig yin la /
analyzed: yang na dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba ni khyad par du bya ba'i tshig yin la /
translated: Alternatively, ≈õrƒ´ heruka is the term to be distinguished,

original: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni khyad par du byed pa'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni khyad par du byed pa'i tshig yin te /
translated: and secret is the term that distinguishes.

original: de nyid kyis ni 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par du gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par du gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The Blessed One has declared this to be the special means of accomplishing all desired aims.

original: thams cad kyi 'dod pa ni 'dod pa kun te de nyid ni don de dgos pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi 'dod pa ni 'dod pa kun te de nyid ni don de dgos pa'o //
translated: All desires are all aims; they are the purpose.

original: de'i @42b sgrub par byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das te de bas na de'o //
analyzed: de'i @42b sgrub par byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das te de bas na de'o //
translated: The Blessed One is the means of accomplishing them, therefore he is that.

original: yang na 'dod pa yang yin la kun yang yin pas 'dod pa kun no zhes bye brag tu mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na 'dod pa yang yin la kun yang yin pas 'dod pa kun no zhes bye brag tu mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Or else, all desires are all, thus the compound is to be resolved as a tatpurusa compound.

original: phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste /
analyzed: phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste /
translated: The later is later than the later.

original: zhes bya ba la bstan par bya ba dang ston pa po khyad par med pa yin pas rgyud phyi ma 'dus pa la sogs pa yin gyi //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la bstan par bya ba dang ston pa po khyad par med pa yin pas rgyud phyi ma 'dus pa la sogs pa yin gyi //
translated: Since there is no difference between the object of instruction and the instructor, the later tantra is the Guhyasamaja and so on.

original: de las kyang gong mar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de las kyang gong mar gyur pa ste /
translated: Later than that is the later of the later.

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The dakini's net is the binding.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa rnams so //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa rnams so //
translated: Dakini refers to those abiding in the three wheels.

original: de'i dra ba zhes bya ba ni tshogs so //
analyzed: de'i dra ba zhes bya ba ni tshogs so //
translated: The net of those is the assembly.

original: de'i sdom pa ni bsgrubs shing sbas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i sdom pa ni bsgrubs shing sbas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term ‚Äúpledge‚Äù is ‚Äúto accomplish and conceal.‚Äù

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni mkha' la 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni mkha' la 'gro ba ste /
translated: The dakinis are those who move in space.

original: nam mkha' 'gro zhing rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nam mkha' 'gro zhing rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term ‚Äúmove in space‚Äù is ‚Äúto move and travel in space.‚Äù

original: yang na mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i ngang tshul can yin pa'am phyi rol du 'gro ba las bzlog pas dra ba ltar 'dir sdom pa yin pas na mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yang na mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i ngang tshul can yin pa'am phyi rol du 'gro ba las bzlog pas dra ba ltar 'dir sdom pa yin pas na mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Or, the dakinis are those who have the nature of moving in space, or they are the ‚Äúnet‚Äù in the sense of being the opposite of ‚Äúgoing outside,‚Äù and thus the ‚Äúnet of dakinis.‚Äù

original: de pas na de brjod byar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de pas na de brjod byar sbyar ro //
translated: Therefore, it is the ‚Äúpledge of the net of dakinis.‚Äù

original: da ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka bdag po nyid kyi bdag nyid chen po yin par bstan cing dang po 'di'i gnas bstan pa ni gsang ba zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: da ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka bdag po nyid kyi bdag nyid chen po yin par bstan cing dang po 'di'i gnas bstan pa ni gsang ba zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate that the glorious Heruka, the Lord, is the great lord himself, the abode of this [Heruka] is first taught as ‚Äúsecret.‚Äù

original: gsang ba'i sgra ni 'dir 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma thams cad yin par bstan pa ste /
analyzed: gsang ba'i sgra ni 'dir 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma thams cad yin par bstan pa ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúsecret‚Äù here indicates all the dakinis who abide in the three wheels.

original: gsang zhing bzang ba'i gsang ba der ro gcig cing tshul gcig pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pa ste /
analyzed: gsang zhing bzang ba'i gsang ba der ro gcig cing tshul gcig pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pa ste /
translated: The secret, the good, is of one taste in that secret, and it pervades the entire realm of space.

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i bzhugs gnas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i bzhugs gnas so //
translated: It is the abode of the Blessed One, glorious Heruka, together with Vajravarahi and so forth.

original: de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: mchog gi zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: mchog gi zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: It is said to be supreme.

original: mchog ni dam pa ste /
analyzed: mchog ni dam pa ste /
translated: Supreme is excellent.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi gzhi yin pas na gtso bo dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi gzhi yin pas na gtso bo dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa yin no //
translated: It is the foremost, the highest, the unsurpassed, because it is the basis of mundane and supramundane wisdom.

original: gzhan yang ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang ji ltar zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how is it?

original: dgyes pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dgyes pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said to be delightful.

original: bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i rol pa'i bya bas nyams dga' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i rol pa'i bya bas nyams dga' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dgyes pa'o //
translated: It is delightful because it is pleasing due to the activity of the enjoyment of unsurpassed worship.

original: da ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la don gzhan ma yin par gsungs pa ni //
analyzed: da ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la don gzhan ma yin par gsungs pa ni //
translated: Now, the excellence of the retinue is stated without any other meaning:

original: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
translated: Always dwelling in one's own nature.

original: zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa yin te /üîΩkhams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can 'khor @43a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa yin te / khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can 'khor @43a * //
translated: This is stated.

original: lo gsum du bzhugs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sku'am rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: lo gsum du bzhugs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sku'am rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The nature of all of the three realms is the nature of the body that exists in the three wheels, or his own nature.

original: der rtag tu zhes bya ba gang du nam yang ma bral ba'i ngo bo nyid du ston to //
analyzed: der rtag tu zhes bya ba gang du nam yang ma bral ba'i ngo bo nyid du ston to //
translated: There indicates that he is always present, in the sense of being inseparable.

original: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gcig pa nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gcig pa nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: The word exists indicates that he is the nature of fearlessness, due to the identity of the three realms.

original: da ni sngon pa phun sum tshogs pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir //üîΩmkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: da ni sngon pa phun sum tshogs pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir // mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni //
translated: Now, in order to teach the perfection of the past,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: he declares, the hero who is the nature of all dakinis.

original: mkha' 'gro'i sgra ni nye bar mchod pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i sgra ni nye bar mchod pa tsam yin te /
translated: The word dakini is merely an honorific.

original: mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dngos po yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dngos po yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: One should understand that he is the nature of all dakas and dakinis,

original: rang bzhin nam rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin nam rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa ste /
translated: in the sense of being their nature, or continuum.

original: gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of merged into one is that he is their nature.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad par spyod pas na sems dpa' yin pa'am /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad par spyod pas na sems dpa' yin pa'am /
translated: He is a hero because he acts for the benefit of all sentient beings.

original: mchog tu brtan pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas na sems dpa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu brtan pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas na sems dpa'o //
translated: Or he is a hero because he possesses the quality of supreme firmness.

original: mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
translated: He is a vajra because he is indivisible.

original: rdo rje ye shes kyis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pas na rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes kyis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pas na rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He is a vajra hero because he acts for the benefit of all sentient beings with vajra intuition.

original: lha chen po dang / khyab 'jug dang tshangs pa la sogs pas mi bskyod pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: lha chen po dang / khyab 'jug dang tshangs pa la sogs pas mi bskyod pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Or he is a vajra hero because he is unshaken by the great gods, Vishnu, Brahma, and so on.

original: yang na thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ram //
analyzed: yang na thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ram //
translated: Or else, he is a vajra hero because he is the essence of means and intuition.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa thabs dang ldan pa nyid kyis khyad par 'phags pa'o //üîΩbla na med pa'i mchod par 'os shing mchog tu bde ba ni yid bde ba'i ngo bo yin pas na mchog tu bde ba ni bcom ldan 'das nyid de /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa thabs dang ldan pa nyid kyis khyad par 'phags pa'o // bla na med pa'i mchod par 'os shing mchog tu bde ba ni yid bde ba'i ngo bo yin pas na mchog tu bde ba ni bcom ldan 'das nyid de /
translated: Or he is a vajra hero because he is superior by possessing the means for the perfect fulfillment of his own and others aims.üîΩHe is the Blessed One, the supreme bliss, because he is the essence of mental felicity, which is the supreme worship and the supreme bliss.

original: bde ba'i sgrar brjod do //
analyzed: bde ba'i sgrar brjod do //
translated: He is called the Blessed One because he is the supreme bliss.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa ci 'di dag lha dang gzhan gyi khyad par yin nam zhes rtog par byed pa la /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa ci 'di dag lha dang gzhan gyi khyad par yin nam zhes rtog par byed pa la /
translated: One might wonder, Are the perfect benefits for oneself and others taught here as being different from the deity?

original: de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clarify that,

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: the following verse is stated:

original: ni zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'o /
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'o /
translated: The syllable i is a definitive particle.üîΩ It is self-arisen, meaning it does not arise from another.

original: rang nyid 'khrungs pas na rang byung ste gzhan las byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang nyid 'khrungs pas na rang byung ste gzhan las byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Moreover, it is stated:

original: de yang / sems can kun gyi sems gang ni /
analyzed: de yang / sems can kun gyi sems gang ni /
translated: The mind of all sentient beingsüîΩis explained as the mind of enlightenment

original: brtan pa'i phyir na sems dpar bshad //
analyzed: brtan pa'i phyir na sems dpar bshad //
translated: because it is stable.

original: mnyam par gzhag pas ting 'dzin te //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pas ting 'dzin te //
translated: Through meditative equipoise, it is samƒÅdhi.

original: nges pa las ni rdo rjer gyur //
analyzed: nges pa las ni rdo rjer gyur //
translated: From ascertainment, it becomes vajra.

original: sems dpar byin brlabs sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: sems dpar byin brlabs sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the yoga of the consecration of the mind of enlightenment,

original: slar yang rdo rje sems dpar gyur //
analyzed: slar yang rdo rje sems dpar gyur //
translated: it again becomes Vajrasattva.

original: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /
translated: As it is said,

original: de yang gang gis kyang ma byas pas na @43b rang byung zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de yang gang gis kyang ma byas pas na @43b rang byung zhes bshad do //
translated: since it is not made by anything, it is explained as self-arisen.

original: skal pa phun sum tshogs pas na bcom ldan no //
analyzed: skal pa phun sum tshogs pas na bcom ldan no //
translated: He is the Bhagavat because he is endowed with good fortune.

original: yang na bdud bzhi la sogs pa bcom pas na bcom ldan zhes bya ba 'am /
analyzed: yang na bdud bzhi la sogs pa bcom pas na bcom ldan zhes bya ba 'am /
translated: Or, he is the Bhagavat because he has conquered the four demons, etc.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa bcom pas na bcom ldan no //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa bcom pas na bcom ldan no //
translated: Or, he is the Bhagavat because he has conquered the afflictions such as passion.

original: yang na dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pas na bcom ldan te /
analyzed: yang na dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pas na bcom ldan te /
translated: Or, he is the Bhagavat because he is endowed with the six qualities of sovereignty, etc.üîΩAnd it is said:üîΩSovereignty, good form, glory, fame,

original: de yang / dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang // brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste //üîΩdrug po de la ldan zhes bya //
analyzed: de yang / dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang // brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste // drug po de la ldan zhes bya //

original: zhes smos pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes smos pa yin no //
translated: are the six qualities with which he is endowed.üîΩHe is the hero, the great hero, the supreme hero.

original: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo 'di zhes sbyar te /
analyzed: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo 'di zhes sbyar te /
translated: The word ‚Äúhero‚Äù is connected with ‚Äúthis‚Äù .

original: dpa' bo nyid la sbyar ba gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'i don yin te /
analyzed: dpa' bo nyid la sbyar ba gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'i don yin te /
translated: The connection with ‚Äúhero‚Äù itself has the meaning of excluding other connections.

original: dper na srid sgrub nyid gzhu 'dzin pa yin gyi /
analyzed: dper na srid sgrub nyid gzhu 'dzin pa yin gyi /
translated: For example, it is like saying ‚ÄúArjuna is the one who holds the bow‚Äù

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta ba'o //
translated: and not someone else.

original: yang na dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid can yin pas na gzhan ma yin pa nyid du gsungs te /
analyzed: yang na dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid can yin pas na gzhan ma yin pa nyid du gsungs te /
translated: Or else, since it is the nature of the twenty-four heroes, it is said to be non-other.

original: de nyid kyis na //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na //
translated: By that very [reason],

original: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin //
translated: it is the dakini-j√±ana-dƒÅka binding.

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn.

original: da ni 'khor lo mnyam pa'i bcom ldan 'das de'i bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩsgra yi tshul las nges 'byung zhing //
analyzed: da ni 'khor lo mnyam pa'i bcom ldan 'das de'i bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir / sgra yi tshul las nges 'byung zhing //
translated: Now, in order to teach the creation stage of that BhagavƒÅn of the equalizing wheel,

original: zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /
translated: it is said fromüîΩarising from the method of soundüîΩup to

original: rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis //üîΩzhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis // zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin te /

analyzed: de yang bla ma'i man ngag las mdor bsdus nas bstan par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, that should be taught in brief from the guru's instruction.

original: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin no //

analyzed: dang por re zhig yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug la bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu khar bcug ste /
translated: First, sitting in a place that is agreeable to the mind, place a pill of the five nectars in the mouth.

original: sngags pa lho phyogs su mngon par bltas te /
analyzed: sngags pa lho phyogs su mngon par bltas te /
translated: The mantrin, facing south,

analyzed: shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i dur khrod chen po'i sa gzhi sprul la //
translated: The ground is the great charnel ground, very frightening.

analyzed: skad cig gis yi ge h'um las bskyed pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rang gi lha mo dang yang dag par ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su sprul te /
translated: Instantly, generated from the syllable h≈´·πÉ, he emanates in the form of the great seal of his deity, who is fully endowed with his consort, who is generated from the syllable ƒÅ·∏•, as will be explained.

original: a'a li dang k'a li lan gsum brjod la he ru ka zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum /üîΩspyi bo dang / lkog ma dang / snying gar rim pa bzhin bkod do //
analyzed: a'a li dang k'a li lan gsum brjod la he ru ka zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum / spyi bo dang / lkog ma dang / snying gar rim pa bzhin bkod do //
translated: Recite the ƒÅlikƒÅli three times and the three syllables of Heruka,

analyzed: chos thams cad ni rgyu dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad ni gang @44a * //
translated: placing them in order on the crown, throat, and heart: All phenomena are free from causes, All phenomena are free from concepts, and All phenomena are free from objects.

analyzed: na yang mi gnas so zhes bya bar rang gi bdag nyid dang / de bzhin du phyi rol gyi brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po rnams mi snang bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should visualize the external, stable and moving things as not appearing.

original: de nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum nam mkha'i phyogs su steng dang 'og gi rim par nye bar dmigs la /
analyzed: de nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum nam mkha'i phyogs su steng dang 'og gi rim par nye bar dmigs la /
translated: Then, by the power of a previous aspiration, the three syllables, O·πÉ, ƒÄ·∏•, and H≈´·πÉ, are visualized in the space above and below, respectively.

original: h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje /
analyzed: h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje /
translated: The H≈´·πÉ transforms into a vajra.

original: rdo rje de'i lte bar h'um gnas pa las byung ba'i yi ge'i 'od zer de lta bus khor yug gi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi nam mkha'i thams cad khyab ste /
analyzed: rdo rje de'i lte bar h'um gnas pa las byung ba'i yi ge'i 'od zer de lta bus khor yug gi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi nam mkha'i thams cad khyab ste /
translated: The vajra is marked with H≈´·πÉ in its center. The light rays of the syllables that arise from that pervade the entire space up to the perimeter of the outer ring.üîΩThe light rays in the form of hooks engage in the benefit of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa la 'jug pa'i lcags kyu'i rnam pa can 'od zer rnams kyis slar yang yi ge gsum po der zhugs la /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa la 'jug pa'i lcags kyu'i rnam pa can 'od zer rnams kyis slar yang yi ge gsum po der zhugs la /
translated: The light rays again enter the three syllables.

original: aom yang a'a: la zhugs /
analyzed: aom yang a'a: la zhugs /
translated: The O·πÉ enters the ƒÄ·∏•.

analyzed: a'a: yang rdo rje la zhugs pa'i rim gyis rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje'i lte bar ro //
translated: The A enters the vajra, and by stages, from the tip of the vajra and so on, it enters the center of the vajra.

original: rdo rje'i lte ba yang yi ge h'um la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i lte ba yang yi ge h'um la'o //
translated: The center of the vajra is in the syllable hum.

original: a'u ni ha la'o //
analyzed: a'u ni ha la'o //

original: ha ni mgo la'o //
analyzed: ha ni mgo la'o //
translated: The ha is in the head.

original: mgo bo yang zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa la'o //
analyzed: mgo bo yang zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa la'o //

original: de yang thig ler ro //
analyzed: de yang thig ler ro //

analyzed: thig le yang sgra la'o // sgra yang sgra tsam la zhugs la //

original: snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to purify the world vessel,

analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge ka las rus sbal lam thong ba //

analyzed: rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can /

original: dam tshig gi lha mo rnams dang / de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams te nyams pas so //
analyzed: dam tshig gi lha mo rnams dang / de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams te nyams pas so //
translated: The pledge goddesses and yoginis who follow them, because of deterioration.

original: dbang bskur ba ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam mo //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam mo //
translated: The consecration is merely an illustration.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: @46a * // da ni sbrang rtsi zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdud rtsi lnga gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: @46a * // da ni sbrang rtsi zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdud rtsi lnga gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Now, beginning with ‚Äúhoney,‚Äù the five nectars are mentioned.

original: sbrang rtsi ni sa bon no //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi ni sa bon no //
translated: Honey is the seed.

original: mtshal ni khrag go //
analyzed: mtshal ni khrag go //
translated: Vermilion is blood.

original: ga pur bcas ni sha chen dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: ga pur bcas ni sha chen dang bcas pa'o //
translated: With camphor is with great meat.

original: yang dmar zhes smos pa ni gci ba'o //
analyzed: yang dmar zhes smos pa ni gci ba'o //
translated: Again, ‚Äúred‚Äù refers to urine.

original: tsandan ni bshad ba ste /
analyzed: tsandan ni bshad ba ste /
translated: Candana is feces.

original: yang tsandan dmar po zhes zlas dbye ba'o //
analyzed: yang tsandan dmar po zhes zlas dbye ba'o //

original: de dag dang sbyar ba zhes mtshams sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: de dag dang sbyar ba zhes mtshams sbyar ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMixed with those‚Äù is a continuation.

original: tshogs kyi nang du zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum gyi dbus su'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi nang du zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum gyi dbus su'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the midst of the assembly‚Äù is in the midst of the three wheels.

original: yang na sbyor ba gcig 'dzin pa'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: yang na sbyor ba gcig 'dzin pa'i dbus su'o //
translated: Or, it is in the midst of the one who holds the union.

original: bzhugs pa ni nyams su len pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bzhugs pa ni nyams su len pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: ni zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba gzhan rnam par bcad pa'o //
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba gzhan rnam par bcad pa'o //

original: thams cad kyang yin la rdo rje yang yin pas thams cad rdo rje ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyang yin la rdo rje yang yin pas thams cad rdo rje ste /
translated: Since all are also vajras, they are all-vajras.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //

original: de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mtshan mar gyur ba'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mtshan mar gyur ba'i dam tshig go //
translated: Their signs are the pledges that are the signs.

original: mtshan ma'i sgra ni padma'i snod de dung chen po zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i sgra ni padma'i snod de dung chen po zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
translated: The word sign refers to the vessel of the lotus, up to the great conch.

original: de 'dzin pas na /
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na /
translated: Since one holds that,

original: thams cad rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'dzin //
analyzed: thams cad rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'dzin //

original: zhes bya'o // 'di dag ni bdud rtsi lnga'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // 'di dag ni bdud rtsi lnga'i khyad par ro //

original: sbom po mtha' ltag rtse sbyar bas //
analyzed: sbom po mtha' ltag rtse sbyar bas //
translated: The tips of the thick end and the back end are joined.

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe bo dang srin lag dag gis myang bar bya ba'o zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe bo dang srin lag dag gis myang bar bya ba'o zhes sbyar ro //

original: rnal 'byor rig pa zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pa zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pas zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: zhi ba'i btung ba zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i btung ba las 'di dman pa ma yin te /
analyzed: zhi ba'i btung ba zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i btung ba las 'di dman pa ma yin te /
translated: The so-called ‚Äúpeaceful drink‚Äù is not inferior to the peaceful drink.

original: de lta mod kyi ji ltar bram ze dag mchod sbyin gyi dus su shin tu dag byed du btung ba de la len par byed de /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi ji ltar bram ze dag mchod sbyin gyi dus su shin tu dag byed du btung ba de la len par byed de /
translated: However, just as the Brahmins drink the very purifying drink at the time of the sacrifice,

original: rnal 'byor rig pa zhes bya bar dgongs te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pa zhes bya bar dgongs te /

original: de lta bu'i sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the mantrin will attain power.

original: rtag pa zhes bya ba ni go sla ba nyid do //
analyzed: rtag pa zhes bya ba ni go sla ba nyid do //

original: mchod pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchod pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The so-called ‚Äúfour offerings‚Äù

original: phyi dang / gsang ba dang / yid dang / nang gi bdag nyid can gyi mchod pa'o //
analyzed: phyi dang / gsang ba dang / yid dang / nang gi bdag nyid can gyi mchod pa'o //
translated: are the offerings of the outer, the secret, the mind, and the inner.

original: yang na phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: yang na phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: Or else, they are the great seal, the pledge seal, the doctrine seal, and the action seal.

original: bzhi po de dag gis mchod pa ni mchod pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: bzhi po de dag gis mchod pa ni mchod pa bzhi'o //

original: de bzhin du /üîΩdbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi //
analyzed: de bzhin du / dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi //

original: zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du gyur ba'o //
translated: is the union of the two.

original: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la bod pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la bod pa'o //
translated: The hero is the Blessed One.

original: de nyid 'dzin zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'dzin zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'o //
translated: The holder of reality is the practitioner.

original: yang na de kho na nyid ni gzhan ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang na de kho na nyid ni gzhan ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Or, reality is non-otherness.

original: de nas @46b 'khor lo gsum 'dzin pa thams cad kyis lhan cig tu ro gcig par 'dzin pas lha dang mi'i bde ba gcig tu bsdu ba byas pas so //
analyzed: de nas @46b 'khor lo gsum 'dzin pa thams cad kyis lhan cig tu ro gcig par 'dzin pas lha dang mi'i bde ba gcig tu bsdu ba byas pas so //
translated: Then, by all the holders of the three wheels simultaneously holding in one taste, the bliss of gods and humans is gathered into one.

original: rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das te de 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rnal 'byor spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das te de 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rnal 'byor spyod pa'o //

original: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
analyzed: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
translated: It does not even amount to a sixteenth.

original: zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bde ba'i cha gcig kyang rnal 'byor gzhan 'dzin pa dag gis char yang mi phod cing thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bde ba'i cha gcig kyang rnal 'byor gzhan 'dzin pa dag gis char yang mi phod cing thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that even a portion of the bliss of such yogis is not even a fraction, and is not attained, by other practitioners who hold it.

original: le'u dang po'o /
analyzed: le'u dang po'o /

original: // / da ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / da ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to show the place for drawing the ma·πá·∏çala, it is said:

original: de la lci ba ma lhung bas //
analyzed: de la lci ba ma lhung bas //
translated: There, without letting the cow dung fall,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: dur khrod du ni kun spyod cing //
analyzed: dur khrod du ni kun spyod cing //
translated: And in the charnel ground,

original: zhes bya ba ni gang du dkyil 'khor 'dri ba der dur khrod chen po lta bur bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang du dkyil 'khor 'dri ba der dur khrod chen po lta bur bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: one should meditate on the place where the ma·πá·∏çala is drawn as being like a great charnel ground.

original: ro bsregs sol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni tshon gyi bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ro bsregs sol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni tshon gyi bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The burnt offering charnel ground, etc.

original: mtshan nyid thams cad ldan zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mtshan nyid thams cad ldan zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means that one should have the characteristics of a master.

original: yang dag shes shing zhes bya ba ni so sor snang ba skyes par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag shes shing zhes bya ba ni so sor snang ba skyes par gyur pa'o //
translated: One who has perfect knowledge is one in whom the appearance of each [deity] has arisen.

original: rgyud ces bya ba ni rgyud kyi don mtha' dag la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud ces bya ba ni rgyud kyi don mtha' dag la mkhas pa'o //
translated: A tantra is one who is skilled in the meaning of the entire tantra.

original: yang na rdo rje dang padma 'dus par ldan pa'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dus dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje dang padma 'dus par ldan pa'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dus dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Or, one who is endowed with the time of the secret empowerment, the union of the vajra and lotus.

original: dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes //
analyzed: dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes //
translated: One who knows the mantra of glorious Heruka

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa dang / the tshom med pa khro ba med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa dang / the tshom med pa khro ba med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is the one who has previously performed the approach, and who is endowed with the characteristics of the master explained in without doubt, without anger, etc.

original: thod pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni yan lag tu bya ba'i rtags ni spyi'i khyad par du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen por ston to //
analyzed: thod pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni yan lag tu bya ba'i rtags ni spyi'i khyad par du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen por ston to //
translated: The skull etc. shows the great seal endowed with the six seals, by the method the branch becomes the general characteristic.

original: dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang // zhes bya ba 'dis ni thod pa'i phreng ba yod par ston to //
analyzed: dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang // zhes bya ba 'dis ni thod pa'i phreng ba yod par ston to //
translated: The one-piece skull ornament shows the garland of skulls.

original: 'di nyid kyis ni dum bu gcig pa'i thod pa mchog nyid du bshad do //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis ni dum bu gcig pa'i thod pa mchog nyid du bshad do //
translated: This very [verse] explains the superiority of the one-piece skull.

original: rgyud thams cad du phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'khrug pa'i tshul gyis ston la //
analyzed: rgyud thams cad du phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'khrug pa'i tshul gyis ston la //
translated: In all the tantras, the characteristics of the great seal etc. are taught in a mixed way.

original: de ni bla ma'i man ngag gis go rims ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bla ma'i man ngag gis go rims ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par spyad par bya'o //
translated: That should be practiced in its entirety according to the guru's instructions, in the proper order.

original: de nyid kyis na blo dang ldan pa bdag nyid dpal he ru kar byas nas gsungs pa yin la de'i 'og tu ni /üîΩdpal @47a * //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na blo dang ldan pa bdag nyid dpal he ru kar byas nas gsungs pa yin la de'i 'og tu ni / dpal @47a * //
translated: Then,üîΩone should recall the glorious

original: ldan he ru ka dran bya //
analyzed: ldan he ru ka dran bya //
translated: Heruka.

original: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod pa kun du spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod pa kun du spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one should practice the arrangement of the mandala.

original: de nyid kyis na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na /
translated: Therefore,

original: 'khor lo 'di ni snying gar dgod //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'di ni snying gar dgod //
translated: one should place this wheel in the heart.

original: ces gsungs pa yin no //üîΩde ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa yin no // de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas //
translated: This is what is said.üîΩThus, having armored oneself,

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la 'di ltar go bgo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la 'di ltar go bgo'o //
translated: one should armor one's body in this way.

original: ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod //
analyzed: ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod //
translated: The fences are placed in the directions.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This means that

original: a'a li k'a li'i dam tshig brjod pa'i rjes thogs la /
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i dam tshig brjod pa'i rjes thogs la /
translated: after reciting the Alikali pledge,

original: zhe sdang gi ra ba dang / 'dod chags kyi ra ba dang / gti mug gi ra ba rnams dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi ra ba dang / 'dod chags kyi ra ba dang / gti mug gi ra ba rnams dgod par bya'o //
translated: one should place the fences of hatred, the fences of passion, and the fences of folly.

original: phyis khang pa brtsegs pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i dus ni rdo rje'i ra ba dang / padma'i ra ba dang / 'khor lo'i ra ba dgod par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: phyis khang pa brtsegs pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i dus ni rdo rje'i ra ba dang / padma'i ra ba dang / 'khor lo'i ra ba dgod par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Later, when the time has come to complete the mansion, etc., one should arrange the vajra fence, the lotus fence, and the wheel fence.

original: de ltar go bgos par gyur nas /
analyzed: de ltar go bgos par gyur nas /
translated: Thus, having been armored in this way,

original: 'og tu 'ang mtshon cha dgod par bya //
analyzed: 'og tu 'ang mtshon cha dgod par bya //
translated: one should also arrange weapons below.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: sa 'og gi mthar thug gi bar du sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du brtan par bya'o //üîΩ'khor lo'i bdag nyid mtshon cha mnyam //
analyzed: sa 'og gi mthar thug gi bar du sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du brtan par bya'o // 'khor lo'i bdag nyid mtshon cha mnyam //
translated: one should stabilize the ground up to the end of the underworld as having the nature of vajra.üîΩThe weapons are equal to the nature of the wheel.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lor gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bdag nyid mtshon cha'i dra bas go bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lor gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bdag nyid mtshon cha'i dra bas go bgo bar bya'o //
translated: One should be armored with a net of weapons, abiding in the wheel and likewise in oneself.

original: steng du mda'i dra ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: steng du mda'i dra ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: Above, one should arrange a net of arrows.

original: mda'i dra ba ni rdo rje'i steng du ste /
analyzed: mda'i dra ba ni rdo rje'i steng du ste /

original: de lta bu'i mda'i dra ba steng du dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i mda'i dra ba steng du dgod par bya'o //
translated: One should arrange such a net of arrows above.

original: yang bdag nyid ces bya ba ni ye shes sems dpa' zhugs pa'i 'og tu gzhal yas khang nang du bzhag la dra ba la sogs pa nye bar bstan par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: yang bdag nyid ces bya ba ni ye shes sems dpa' zhugs pa'i 'og tu gzhal yas khang nang du bzhag la dra ba la sogs pa nye bar bstan par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Moreover, one's own means that after the entrance of the gnosis being, one should be placed inside the celestial mansion and the net, etc. should be taught.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dkyil 'khor bri ba la sngags pa 'jigs pa med pa nyid du ston to //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dkyil 'khor bri ba la sngags pa 'jigs pa med pa nyid du ston to //
translated: Thus, etc. shows that the mantrin is fearless in drawing the mandala.

original: sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas //
translated: Adorned with mantra and seal

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: legs par bslabs shing mkhas pa'i phyi'i lha mo dang lhan cig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: legs par bslabs shing mkhas pa'i phyi'i lha mo dang lhan cig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: that he is together with an outer goddess who is well trained and skilled.

original: dngos grub ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: dngos grub ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Accomplishment, etc. is easy to understand.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa la spyad par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa la spyad par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Then, etc. means that one should engage in the drawing of the mandala lines.

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba mchog //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba mchog //
translated: The supreme net of dakinis

original: ces bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa thams cad ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa thams cad ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: means all those abiding in the three wheels.

original: mchod ces bya ba ni mchod pa bya ba'am sbyin par bya ba'o //
analyzed: mchod ces bya ba ni mchod pa bya ba'am sbyin par bya ba'o //
translated: Worship means to worship or to give.

original: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don ji lta ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don ji lta ba nyid yin no //
translated: In the middle of that and so forth is just as the meaning.

original: mdangs dang ldan zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phyag rgya chen po'i @47b mtshan nyid rgyas par bstan te /
analyzed: mdangs dang ldan zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phyag rgya chen po'i @47b mtshan nyid rgyas par bstan te /
translated: By radiant and so forth, the characteristics of the Great Seal are taught in detail.

original: mdangs dang ldan zhes bya ba ni gzi brjid dang bcas shing shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mdangs dang ldan zhes bya ba ni gzi brjid dang bcas shing shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Radiant means with splendor and very shining, is the meaning.

original: lhag ma ni don ji lta ba nyid do //
analyzed: lhag ma ni don ji lta ba nyid do //
translated: The rest is just as the meaning.

original: smin ma bzang po rdo rje dbyes //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: smin ma bzang po rdo rje dbyes // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Good eyebrows, a diamond-like parting of the hair.

original: smin ma bzang zhing mnyam pa ni smin ma bzang po ste /
analyzed: smin ma bzang zhing mnyam pa ni smin ma bzang po ste /
translated: Good and even eyebrows are good eyebrows.

original: rdo rje ltar dbyes pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rdo rje ltar dbyes pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One who has a parting of the hair like a diamond is called that.

original: yang na dpral ba'i rdo rje phreng ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du smin ma dbyes shing gyes pa mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang na dpral ba'i rdo rje phreng ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du smin ma dbyes shing gyes pa mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: de bas na don ni 'di yin te /

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //

analyzed: bum pa ma rnyed na ni dgur bya la /

analyzed: ces bya ba ni sngags kyis dag cing dri dang bcas pa'i rdo rje'i chus bdag nyid la legs par gtor bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: ma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni //

analyzed: gal te dngos grub ces bya ba la sogs pas ni mchod pa rnam pa lnga ston te /

analyzed: dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don ji lta ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam par ma phye'o //

analyzed: rab mnyam gzhag ste zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad la rnam par dag par shes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: The words well-equipoised are up to the understanding of purity in all the offering rituals.

original: le'u gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: le'u gnyis pa'o /

original: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: slob dpon zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor dang nye ba gang dag yin pa de thams cad slob dpon zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: ci nus pas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bla ma la mchod pa ston to //

analyzed: dril bu la sogs pas zhes bya bas ni gtso bo las gzhan pa'i slob dpon rnams kyis bya ba'i las gsungs pa yin no //

analyzed: rnga brdung zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mchod pa'i chod pa'i cha ga nyi shu gsungs pa yin no //
translated: By beat the drum, etc., the twenty-three parts of the worship are stated.

original: de yi rigs ni bstan par bya //
analyzed: de yi rigs ni bstan par bya //

original: zhes bya ba'i bar du go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar du go sla'o //

analyzed: de'i rjes thogs la rgyud gzhan las rab tu grags pa'i cho gas dbang bskur ba thams cad rdzogs par byas nas /

translated: The phrase well equipoised indicates the yoga of oneself as glorious Heruka, and that one should generate oneself in union with Vajravarahi, don the great armor, and so forth, and that one should also do the same for the disciple.

original: nyi ma gnyis pa la slar yang dkyil 'khor legs par mchod de /
analyzed: nyi ma gnyis pa la slar yang dkyil 'khor legs par mchod de /

original: byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa legs par byas nas /

analyzed: phyag rgya mchog ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi bud med sngags kyi rgyud legs par bslabs pa //

analyzed: bza' bar bya ba dang / bsrung bar bya ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig dang ldan pa /

analyzed: lha'i ting nge 'dzin la legs par gnas shing sbyor ba gcig pa la bya'i /

analyzed: gzhan dag la ni ma yin no //

original: mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis //
analyzed: mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis //

original: de la thig le bya ba yin //
analyzed: de la thig le bya ba yin //

original: zhes bya ba ni sngar @49a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngar @49a * //

analyzed: bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir lha mo me tog dang ldan pa de dang lhan cig par bad s+ya ma na la sogs pa'i rim gyis ji ltar dga' ba bskyed par gyur pa de ltar rdo rje dang padmar 'dus pa'i rim gyis 'byung ba'i gnas skabs

analyzed: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dang phreng ba'i sngags brjod par byas la /

analyzed: slob mas kyang bdud rtsi bzhin du longs spyad par bya'o //

analyzed: de nas de'i 'og tu gdong g-yogs phye la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o //

analyzed: de nas gang gi lha'i gnas gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i gnas so //

analyzed: der de bstan par bya zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur bar rab tu nus pa'i phyi'i lha mo bstan par bya'o //

analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i yid kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúCorrectly‚Äù means with a nonconceptual mind.

analyzed: de nas slob mas kyang de bzhin du brtsam par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Then, since the disciple should also commence in that way,üîΩthen the disciple, perfectly equipoised,

analyzed: de nas slob ma rab mnyam gzhag / rab tu btud par byas nas ni //
translated: having bowed perfectly,

original: g-yon nas brtsams pa'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: g-yon nas brtsams pa'i rim pa yis //

analyzed: de nas bskor ba rab tu bya //

original: dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la //

analyzed: ba ni ngal ba'i gnas su byed pa'o //

analyzed: dbang po zlog par byed do zhes bya ba ni khros na gzhan gyi dbang po mi sdod par byed do //

analyzed: sa g-yo bar byed pa ni thams cad chos 'byung ba'i nga rgyal du bya bas bskyod pa'o //

analyzed: shing la 'dzegs te gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do zhes bya ba ni rig pa dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed pa'o //

original: sngags thams cad 'phrog par byed pa dang zhes bya ba ni khams gsum na gang cung zad rang gi khyim na gsang ba bshad pa de thams cad 'khrul 'khor la gnas bzhin du thos so //

translated: Stealing all mantras means that whatever is a little bit secret in one's own house in the three realms, all of that is heard while abiding in the ma·πá·∏çala.

analyzed: dngos grub thams cad 'phrog par byed do zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ni rig pa 'dzin pa dang 'brel pa ste /

analyzed: khrag 'dren par byed pa dang zhes bya ba ni srung ba dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po yang 'gugs par byed do //

analyzed: slar yang rang gi gnas su 'jog par byed do //

analyzed: gzugs brgya stong phrag du ma byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can ma lus pa'i don bya ba'i phyir rang gi lus thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa las rnam pa de lta bus nam mkha' ma lus par khyab par byed pa 'byin par byed do //
translated: He creates many hundreds of thousands of forms means that in order to act for the welfare of all sentient beings, he emits in that way from his body endowed with means and wisdom, pervading the entire sky.

analyzed: lha mo rnams kyi 'dod pas zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: rtse mo rnams ni padma'i sna rtse ste /
analyzed: rtse mo rnams ni padma'i sna rtse ste /

original: chung ngu dang par ma dang chen po tsam gyis rdo rje dang padma 'dus pa nyid du byed ces bya ba'i don to //üîΩdug bdud rtsir byed do zhes bya ba ni dug bdud rtsi ltar ston par byed do //
analyzed: chung ngu dang par ma dang chen po tsam gyis rdo rje dang padma 'dus pa nyid du byed ces bya ba'i don to // dug bdud rtsir byed do zhes bya ba ni dug bdud rtsi ltar ston par byed do //

analyzed: tha mal pa'i gzugs kyis spyod cing chags par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: gdong gis nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dang 'dra bar 'gro zhing song ba'o //

original: 'byin par byed cing zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' lding 'gro bar byed pa ni gshog pa gnyis rkyong bar byed la /
analyzed: 'byin par byed cing zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' lding 'gro bar byed pa ni gshog pa gnyis rkyong bar byed la /
translated: ‚ÄúOne emits‚Äù means that when the Garu·∏ça goes, it extends its two wings.

original: de bzhin du zhi ba'i 'dus pas lha mo dang kun du spyod pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhi ba'i 'dus pas lha mo dang kun du spyod pa ste /
translated: In the same way, with the union of peace, one should practice with the goddess.

original: khas byang chub kyi sems blangs nas lha mo'i khar sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khas byang chub kyi sems blangs nas lha mo'i khar sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that, having taken up the bodhicitta with the mouth, one should give it to the mouth of the goddess.

original: mi mchog ces bya ba ni mi mchog gang 'di ltar spyod pa de ni 'jig rten gsum na mchog tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi mchog ces bya ba ni mi mchog gang 'di ltar spyod pa de ni 'jig rten gsum na mchog tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The one who is supreme among men is the one who is supreme among men, who is supreme in the three worlds, in this way, is the meaning.

original: lag mthil na yod pa'i dpal gang gis kyang 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i rnal 'byor ba la bzhed pa tsam la rag las pa'i rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang gzhom par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lag mthil na yod pa'i dpal gang gis kyang 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i rnal 'byor ba la bzhed pa tsam la rag las pa'i rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang gzhom par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The glory that is in the palm of the hand is not taken away by anyone, means that even all the conquerors, who are dependent on the mere will of such a yogin, are not able to conquer him, is the meaning.

original: rnam pa de lta bu ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ji lta ba nyid do /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ji lta ba nyid do /
translated: The meaning of just as it is, such as the one who is like this, and so on, is just that.

original: rab kyi mthar thug pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab kyi mthar thug pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the very limit of the best.

original: dur khrod kyi sol ba la zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dur khrod kyi sol ba la zhes bya ba la /
translated: On the charcoal of a charnel ground, and so on, means

original: 'dir man ngag brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir man ngag brjod par bya ste /
translated: here the instruction should be stated.

original: ba ru ra'i shing gi lho phyogs su gtogs pa'i yal ga sme sha can gyis sta re la sogs pas bcad la mar gyi ngo'i bcu bzhi la mtshan mo bsregs te /
analyzed: ba ru ra'i shing gi lho phyogs su gtogs pa'i yal ga sme sha can gyis sta re la sogs pas bcad la mar gyi ngo'i bcu bzhi la mtshan mo bsregs te /
translated: The branch of a tree belonging to the south of a bhurja tree is cut with an axe, and so on, on the fourteenth day of the waxing moon, burned at night,üîΩand the ashes are collected.

original: bong bu'i gcin gyis bsad la sol ba de dag gi thal ba blangs te legs par bzhag nas de'i 'og tu sngags gong ma'i cho ga bzhin du byas na de'i 'bras bu mi bzlogs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bong bu'i gcin gyis bsad la sol ba de dag gi thal ba blangs te legs par bzhag nas de'i 'og tu sngags gong ma'i cho ga bzhin du byas na de'i 'bras bu mi bzlogs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one takes the ashes of those [bones] burned by the urine of an ass, and having well placed them, one does the rite of the above mantra, the result will not be averted.üîΩWith a branch of atimuktaka, one should do the rite of protection.

analyzed: bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu dmar po bya ste /

original: lhag ma ni don ji lta ba nyid do //

analyzed: le'u bcu gcig pa'o /

analyzed: lcags gsum zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The three metals are

translated: The procedure is as follows: having taken a human skull, the mantrin, having performed the preliminary worship, instantly in the application of Vajra Wrath, reciting the syllable H≈™·πÄ, and having emitted from his right nostril Khandaroha holding a weapon in her hand,

translated: These are for the adept who has attained power.

analyzed: cad bya'o // le'u bcu gnyis pa'o /

analyzed: // / rang gi khrag la lan gsum bzlas nas khar bcug la phyir phyung ste thig le byas na khrag 'dren par byed do /

translated: On the four intermediate petals are a blood-filled skull cup and the twenty-four spokes, and on the forty-eight spokes are the mantras of Kha·πá·∏çakapƒÅla and so on.

analyzed: rtsa ba'i @55a * //
translated: The root

analyzed: bza' bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: le'u bcu bzhi pa'o /

original: // / da ni /
analyzed: // / da ni /

analyzed: de nas sdom pa thams cad la //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas yi ge'i brda ston pa yin te /
