analyzed: gang la sngags byin pa de snod dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin gyi //
translated: to whom the mantra is given becomes a suitable vessel,

original: gzhan dag ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: but not others. This is the meaning.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnal 'byor pas gang zhig spyod pa bya ba ston to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnal 'byor pas gang zhig spyod pa bya ba ston to //
translated: Then, the words then and so forth indicate the conduct that a yogin should perform.

original: skyes pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: skyes pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The words male and so forth indicate that

original: skyes pa'am bud med rnal 'byor ma mthong nas g-yon pa'i cha yis dbang du byas te 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: skyes pa'am bud med rnal 'byor ma mthong nas g-yon pa'i cha yis dbang du byas te 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: Having seen a man or a yoginƒ´, one should go by the left side.

original: khyim dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: khyim dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: In the house, etc.

original: khyim mam zhing du gnas pa shin tu ring po na gnas pa yang shes par byas @57a * //
analyzed: khyim mam zhing du gnas pa shin tu ring po na gnas pa yang shes par byas @57a * //
translated: One should know that one who is in a house or field, even if far away, is in the left quarter.

original: la g-yon nas spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩhe ru ka las sbyor gzhan med //
analyzed: la g-yon nas spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med //
translated: The meaning is that one should go by the left side.üîΩThere is no other practice than Heruka.

original: ces bya ba ni he ru ka'i rnal 'byor las mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor gzhan dag med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni he ru ka'i rnal 'byor las mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor gzhan dag med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no other yoga that is superior to the yoga of Heruka.

original: de nyid kyis na //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na //
translated: For that very reason,

original: slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid yin //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid yin // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the master is a yoginƒ´ herself.

original: rnal 'byor de 'dzin pa'i slob dpon ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i ma mo'i gnas su gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de 'dzin pa'i slob dpon ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i ma mo'i gnas su gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the master who holds that yoga is everywhere a place of the mother who goes everywhere.

original: rgyud 'di ru ni sgrub pa po //
analyzed: rgyud 'di ru ni sgrub pa po //
translated: In this tantra, the adept

original: legs par gyur pa nyid yin te //
analyzed: legs par gyur pa nyid yin te //
translated: is just a good person.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'dir dbang bskur ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams brnyas par mi bya ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'dir dbang bskur ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams brnyas par mi bya ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar ro //
translated: This is to be applied to one should not despise the yogins who have been initiated in this Tantra, etc.

original: pho nya mo brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: pho nya mo brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The eight messengers, etc.

original: mos dang dad pa 'phel byed pa //
analyzed: mos dang dad pa 'phel byed pa //
translated: One should increase devotion and faith

original: zhes bya ba yin no //üîΩdngos grub rnams kyi rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin no // dngos grub rnams kyi rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: is to be supplied.üîΩOne should not despise the yoginis who have been initiated in this Tantra, etc.

original: de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: sngar bshad pa'i g-yon nas spyod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig bsrung ba ni dang po'o //üîΩlha mo gzhan dang sbyar ba yi //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i g-yon nas spyod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig bsrung ba ni dang po'o // lha mo gzhan dang sbyar ba yi //
translated: The first is the protection of the commitments of the left-side conduct, etc., as previously explained.

original: 'dod pa rnam par rmongs 'gyur ba //
analyzed: 'dod pa rnam par rmongs 'gyur ba //
translated: The second is the avoidance of union with another goddess, as stated in the verse:üîΩOne who is deluded by desire, who is attached to desire,üîΩwho is attached to desire and imagines union with another goddess,

original: zhes bya ba ni gang 'dod pa la chags shing rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i 'dod pas lha mo gzhan dang kun du sbyor bar byed pa de ni 'dod pa la chags shing rmongs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang 'dod pa la chags shing rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i 'dod pas lha mo gzhan dang kun du sbyor bar byed pa de ni 'dod pa la chags shing rmongs pa ste /
translated: is deluded by desire and attachment to desire.

original: de bas na gzhan dang sbyor ba spangs pa ni gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gzhan dang sbyor ba spangs pa ni gnyis pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the second is the avoidance of union with another.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi char 'byed pa med pa de ni gsum pa'o //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi char 'byed pa med pa de ni gsum pa'o //
translated: The third is the absence of the distinction of self and other.

original: thogs pa med pa ni bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: thogs pa med pa ni bzhi pa'o //
translated: The fourth is the absence of obstruction.üîΩThe practice of the conduct of the commitments

original: dam tshig spyod pa spyad pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dam tshig ni lha mo rnams so //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa spyad pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dam tshig ni lha mo rnams so //
translated: The commitments are the goddesses.

original: de kun spyod pa ni 'dod pa rnams so //
analyzed: de kun spyod pa ni 'dod pa rnams so //
translated: The conduct is the objects of desire.

original: de spyad pa ni bya ba ste /üîΩde dag gang yin pa de ni //
analyzed: de spyad pa ni bya ba ste / de dag gang yin pa de ni //
translated: The practice is the performance.üîΩThe practice of the conduct of the commitments

original: dam tshig spyod pa spyad pa dang // zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa spyad pa dang // zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o //
translated: is the fifth.

original: bud med dbang phyug kun du sbyor //
analyzed: bud med dbang phyug kun du sbyor //
translated: The union with the powerful womanüîΩis the sixth.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa shin tu sbyor bas rdo rje dang padma shin tu 'dus pa'i dus su dbang phyug ma nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa shin tu sbyor bas rdo rje dang padma shin tu 'dus pa'i dus su dbang phyug ma nyid yin zhing /
translated: The union with the nondual is the union of the vajra and lotus. At the time of the complete union, she is the powerful one.

original: dbang phyug ma dang bral bar mi bya'i //
analyzed: dbang phyug ma dang bral bar mi bya'i //
translated: One should not be separated from the powerful one.

original: 'on kyang dbang phyug nyid du bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te drug pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang dbang phyug nyid du bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te drug pa'o //
translated: One should be the powerful one.

original: tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin bzhi //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin bzhi //
translated: The four are the practice of celibacy.

original: zhes bya ba ni bzhi po byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa'i dus su tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bzhi po byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa'i dus su tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o //
translated: This is the seventh, called ‚Äúthe practice of celibacy‚Äù at the time of the emission of the bodhicitta.

original: khro mer rgyun gyis kun du spyad //
analyzed: khro mer rgyun gyis kun du spyad //
translated: One should practice with a smiling face.

original: ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems len pa'i dus su sdang bar mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems len pa'i dus su sdang bar mi byed pa ste /
translated: This is the eighth, called ‚Äúnot being angry‚Äù at the time of taking the bodhicitta.

original: de ltar na dam tshig brgyad de /
analyzed: de ltar na dam tshig brgyad de /
translated: Thus there are eight pledges.

original: 'di dag sgrub pa pos @57b mchog dang gtso bor shes par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di dag sgrub pa pos @57b mchog dang gtso bor shes par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
translated: The adept should know them as supreme and foremost.

original: rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste /
analyzed: rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste /
translated: They are common to all tantras.

original: zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i rgyud 'di ni rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i rgyud 'di ni rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong pa ste /
translated: This secret tantra is common to all tantras.

original: de nyid kyis na gsang ba yin pas dgongs pa rgyud gzhan du ni ma bshad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na gsang ba yin pas dgongs pa rgyud gzhan du ni ma bshad do //
translated: Since it is secret, it is not explained in other tantras.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: rgyu yis gzhom par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu yis gzhom par mi bya'o //
translated: one should not violate it with a reason.

original: zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: rgyu zhes bya ba ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma rnams kyis gzhom mi bya ste zhes bya ba smad par mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu zhes bya ba ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma rnams kyis gzhom mi bya ste zhes bya ba smad par mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The cause should not be destroyed by the valid cognitions such as perception, etc. The meaning is that it should not be disparaged.

original: yang ci zhig bya zhes //
analyzed: yang ci zhig bya zhes //
translated: What should be done?

original: dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yin //üîΩzhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yin // zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: It should be taken up by faith alone.

original: mig dang zhes bya ba ni don de nyid ston to //
analyzed: mig dang zhes bya ba ni don de nyid ston to //
translated: The eye shows that very meaning.

original: mthe'u chung gis bskyod ces bya ba ni dus su lha mo'i mchod pa'i dus lha mo'i sbyor pa dang ldan zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mthe'u chung gis bskyod ces bya ba ni dus su lha mo'i mchod pa'i dus lha mo'i sbyor pa dang ldan zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The little finger means that at the time of the worship of the goddess, one should be endowed with the union of the goddess. The meaning is that.

original: yang na sngags dang phyag rgya legs par bslabs pa ma rnyed na ni cig shos tha mal pa ma yin par byas la mchod par bya'o //üîΩpho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas //
analyzed: yang na sngags dang phyag rgya legs par bslabs pa ma rnyed na ni cig shos tha mal pa ma yin par byas la mchod par bya'o // pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas //
translated: Or, if one does not find a well-trained mantra and mudra, one should make an offering to the other, who is not ordinary.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The messengers are truly present.

original: de ltar dus de'i tshe blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba pho nya mo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar dus de'i tshe blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba pho nya mo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that thus, at that time, the wise one delights all the messengers.

original: mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang // gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi'o zhes bya ba ni yon tan dang ldan pa'i mi ste rnal 'byor ma'i khyad par gsum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang // gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi'o zhes bya ba ni yon tan dang ldan pa'i mi ste rnal 'byor ma'i khyad par gsum du 'gyur te /
translated: The man who is endowed with good qualities is a special yoginƒ´, of three kinds.

original: mnyes byed ces bya ba ni spobs pa bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: mnyes byed ces bya ba ni spobs pa bskyed pa'o //
translated: The pleasing one is the one who generates eloquence.

original: rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni nus pa skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni nus pa skyes pa'o //
translated: The pure one is the one who generates ability.

original: gsal byed ces bya ba ni 'phral du gsal bar byed cing cung zad nus pa skyes pa la rang dang gzhan gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gsal byed ces bya ba ni 'phral du gsal bar byed cing cung zad nus pa skyes pa la rang dang gzhan gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: The illuminating one is the one who illuminates oneself and others, who generates a little ability and illuminates immediately.

original: spobs pa skyes pas bstan bcos dang mi 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: spobs pa skyes pas bstan bcos dang mi 'gal ba'o //
translated: The one who generates eloquence does not contradict the treatises.

original: yang na mnyes byed ni sngags kyi sbyor ba la goms pas lha rnams mnyes par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na mnyes byed ni sngags kyi sbyor ba la goms pas lha rnams mnyes par byed pa'o //
translated: Alternatively, the pleasing one is the one who pleases the gods by being familiar with the practice of mantra.

original: yon tan dang ldan pa ni bstan bcos kyi don shes pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan dang ldan pa ni bstan bcos kyi don shes pa'o //
translated: The one endowed with good qualities is the one who knows the meaning of the treatises.

original: gsal byed ni sgron ma ltar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi bya ba byed nus pa'o //
analyzed: gsal byed ni sgron ma ltar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi bya ba byed nus pa'o //
translated: The illuminating one is the one who is able to perform the activity of benefiting all sentient beings, like a lamp.

original: le'u nyi shu drug pa'o /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu drug pa'o /
translated: This was the twenty-sixth chapter on the description of the signs of accomplishment in the ‚ÄúEmergence of Cakrasa·πÉvara.‚Äù

original: // / yul dang yul de rab song ba //
analyzed: // / yul dang yul de rab song ba //
translated: The object and the one who goes to the object

original: pho nya'i gzugs su mtshon pa yin //
analyzed: pho nya'i gzugs su mtshon pa yin //
translated: are indicated by the form of the messenger.

original: zhes bya ba la rnal 'byor pa gsum po de dag kyang gzugs dang mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i pho nya yul dag ni snang ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩpho nya ral gri'i so 'dra zhing //üîΩzhes bya ba ni pho nya mo ral gri'i so ltar rtag tu mnyes par dka' @58a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rnal 'byor pa gsum po de dag kyang gzugs dang mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i pho nya yul dag ni snang ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to // pho nya ral gri'i so 'dra zhing // zhes bya ba ni pho nya mo ral gri'i so ltar rtag tu mnyes par dka' @58a * //
translated: The three yogas are the messengers who are endowed with form and characteristics, and the objects are the appearances.üîΩThe messenger is like the edge of a sword.

original: ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The messenger is like the edge of a sword, always difficult to please.

original: dag byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la /üîΩsgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob //
analyzed: dag byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la / sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob //
translated: The one who is purified, etc.üîΩThe adept obtains power.

original: ces bya ba ni de rnams sgrub pa pos thob nas mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni de rnams sgrub pa pos thob nas mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Having obtained those, the adept obtains the desired power.

original: gzhan dag ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni go sla'o //
translated: The others are easy to understand.

original: sgrub pa po yi pho nya gnyis //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yi pho nya gnyis //
translated: The two messengers of the adept

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: are for the accomplishment of mundane and supramundane powers.

original: dngos grub cho ga la spyod che //
analyzed: dngos grub cho ga la spyod che //
translated: One should practice the rite of spiritual powers.üîΩ

original: pho nya gcig pu kho na yin //
analyzed: pho nya gcig pu kho na yin //
translated: The sole messenger is the great one who enjoys the rite of power.

original: zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru ka'i sbyor ba gcig pa nyid yin no zhes lhag par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru ka'i sbyor ba gcig pa nyid yin no zhes lhag par bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching of the supremacy of the single yoga of the glorious Heruka.

original: yang na dngos grub la spyod pas na la la zhig gi de nyid gcig pu rnal 'byor gyi mchog yin te //
analyzed: yang na dngos grub la spyod pas na la la zhig gi de nyid gcig pu rnal 'byor gyi mchog yin te //
translated: Or else, the one reality is the supreme yoga of the one who enjoys the rite of power.

original: de'i tshe pho nya mo rnal 'byor ma rab tu bskul ba yin zhing dngos grub pa dang nye bar 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe pho nya mo rnal 'byor ma rab tu bskul ba yin zhing dngos grub pa dang nye bar 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
translated: At that time, the messenger, the yoginƒ´, is fully aroused and becomes close to the rite of power.

original: bla ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i //
analyzed: bla ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i //
translated: The consecration obtained from the succession of gurus

original: dbang bskur ba ni sngags legs ldan //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni sngags legs ldan //
translated: is the mantra well-endowed,

original: pho nya rnams su yang dag bshad //
analyzed: pho nya rnams su yang dag bshad //
translated: and is explained as the messengers.

original: ces bya ba ni slob dpon brgyud pa'i rim pa las dbang bskur ba thob pa las sngags dang legs par ldan par gang gi tshe sgrub pa de'i tshe pho nya mo rnams su yang dag par bshad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni slob dpon brgyud pa'i rim pa las dbang bskur ba thob pa las sngags dang legs par ldan par gang gi tshe sgrub pa de'i tshe pho nya mo rnams su yang dag par bshad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The consecration obtained from the succession of gurus is the mantra well-endowed. When one practices at that time, the messengers are explained. This is the meaning.

original: phyag rgya legs sbyor ngang tshul dang / zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rnal 'byor ma dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyag rgya legs sbyor ngang tshul dang / zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rnal 'byor ma dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means the one who is endowed with the nature of the union with the external yoginis.

original: yang dag rdzogs zhes bya ba ni de tshe yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs zhes bya ba ni de tshe yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The one who is perfectly complete means that at that time he is completely perfect.

original: ye shes rgyu skyes zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rab kyi mthar thug pa'i rgyu dang byed pa can yin te /
analyzed: ye shes rgyu skyes zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rab kyi mthar thug pa'i rgyu dang byed pa can yin te /
translated: The one who is born from the cause of wisdom means that he is the cause and agent of the Bhagavat's highest perfection.

original: dpal he ru ka ni de las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka ni de las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The glorious Heruka is born from him, means that he is the meaning of the word.

original: sems kyi bdag nyid nang par langs //
analyzed: sems kyi bdag nyid nang par langs //
translated: The one who is of the nature of mind, having arisen in the morning,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: means

original: sems kyi bdag nyid ni phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa mtshan mo'i mthar mal nas langs pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi bdag nyid ni phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa mtshan mo'i mthar mal nas langs pa'o //
translated: the one who is of the nature of mind, endowed with the union with the great mudra, having arisen from bed at the end of the night.

original: gzugs kyi bya ba kun byas te //
analyzed: gzugs kyi bya ba kun byas te //
translated: Having performed all the rites of form,

original: zhes bya ba ni lus la dpa' bo drug gi go cha la sogs pa go bskon pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus la dpa' bo drug gi go cha la sogs pa go bskon pa'o //
translated: means having put on the armor of the six heroes and so forth on the body.

original: lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni //
analyzed: lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni //
translated: The one who is well armed with weapons on the body,

original: lus la gnas pas kun du spyod //
analyzed: lus la gnas pas kun du spyod //
translated: By abiding in the body, one should practice.

original: ces bya ba ni lus thams cad la mtshon cha'i dra bas g-yogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni lus thams cad la mtshon cha'i dra bas g-yogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one should cover the entire body with a net of weapons.

original: dag byed byas pa'i lus la ni //
analyzed: dag byed byas pa'i lus la ni //
translated: On the body that has been purified,

original: rtag tu sngags 'di brjod par bya //
analyzed: rtag tu sngags 'di brjod par bya //
translated: one should always recite this mantra.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar rtag tu bsrung pa'i cho ga byas pa'i @58b sngags pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar rtag tu bsrung pa'i cho ga byas pa'i @58b sngags pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: This means that the mantra practitioner should always recite the mantra, having performed the rite of protection in this way.

original: rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges ston cing //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges ston cing //
translated: Revealing the places of yoga,

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor te ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor te ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Yoga means meditative concentration.

original: gnas ni bud med de //
analyzed: gnas ni bud med de //
translated: Place means a woman.

original: de bstan cing de ltar go cha bgo par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bstan cing de ltar go cha bgo par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one should don the armor in that way, revealing that.

original: mtshon cha rnams ni bgom mi bya //
analyzed: mtshon cha rnams ni bgom mi bya //
translated: One should not don the weapons.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i mtshon cha la sogs pa las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i mtshon cha la sogs pa las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
translated: This means that one should not transgress the weapons and so forth as explained.

original: yang na mtshon cha ltar mtshon du gyur pa'i phyo nya mo yin te /
analyzed: yang na mtshon cha ltar mtshon du gyur pa'i phyo nya mo yin te /
translated: Or else, the weapons are the weapons that have become the yoginis.

original: de bgom par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de bgom par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not don them.

original: yang na mtshon ni rang dang gzhan gyi mtshon cha rnams so //
analyzed: yang na mtshon ni rang dang gzhan gyi mtshon cha rnams so //
translated: Or, the weapons are the weapons of oneself and others.

original: dam tshig can la khro mi bya //
analyzed: dam tshig can la khro mi bya //
translated: One should not be angry with those who have the commitments.

original: zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: rnam par thams cad du khro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par thams cad du khro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should not be angry in any way.

original: mngon par brtson pas 'da' mi bya //
analyzed: mngon par brtson pas 'da' mi bya //
translated: One should not transgress through exertion.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'dir ram gzhan dag tu mngon par brtson pa de las 'da' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'dir ram gzhan dag tu mngon par brtson pa de las 'da' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one should not transgress that exertion either in this tantra or in others.

original: de dang lhan cig ts'a ru bya //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig ts'a ru bya //
translated: One should perform the cƒÅrune together with them.

original: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig can rnams dang lhan cig tu longs spyod gcig tu bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig can rnams dang lhan cig tu longs spyod gcig tu bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that one should enjoy together with those who have the commitments.

original: yang na sgo ni thabs te /
analyzed: yang na sgo ni thabs te /
translated: Or, the door is the means.

original: phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i thabs bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i thabs bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should perform the means for accomplishing the great seal.

original: bde ba zhes bya ba ni gzhung gzhan no //
analyzed: bde ba zhes bya ba ni gzhung gzhan no //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: grol ba'i don du thun bzhir bya //
analyzed: grol ba'i don du thun bzhir bya //
translated: One should perform the four sessions for the sake of liberation.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtag tu rnal 'byor dang ldan yang nyin dang mtshan du thun bzhir bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtag tu rnal 'byor dang ldan yang nyin dang mtshan du thun bzhir bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that even though one is always endowed with yoga, one should practice in four sessions during the day and night.

original: dam tshig spyod pa zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa zhes bya ba la //
translated: The conduct of the commitments

original: dam tshig ni lha mo ste de dang kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni lha mo ste de dang kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: is the conduct with the goddesses.

original: yang na dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba ste spyad pa'o //
analyzed: yang na dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba ste spyad pa'o //
translated: Or else, the commitments are the things to be guarded and the things to be eaten, and one should practice them.

original: de 'khor ci dgar grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de 'khor ci dgar grol bar 'gyur //
translated: One is liberated as one wishes in the retinue.

original: zhes bya ba ni nges par 'di ltar 'khor ba'i rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang zhing du 'khor zhing bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa de ci dgar grol bar gyur te /üîΩci ltar 'dod par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nges par 'di ltar 'khor ba'i rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang zhing du 'khor zhing bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa de ci dgar grol bar gyur te / ci ltar 'dod par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that the yogƒ´ who is thus in cyclic existence is liberated as he wishes, that is, as he desires, in the retinue of the places and fields where he practices meditation.

original: gnag la dga' bar rtag tu bya //
analyzed: gnag la dga' bar rtag tu bya //
translated: One should always delight in the dark.

original: zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one should practice at night.

original: srog chags yan lag las byung gyon //
analyzed: srog chags yan lag las byung gyon //
translated: One should wear the garments made from the limbs of living beings.

original: zhes bya ba ni pags pa'i gos bgos zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pags pa'i gos bgos zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of ‚Äúclothed in the garment of skin.‚Äù

original: bde ba 'dod pas bde thob 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba la //
analyzed: bde ba 'dod pas bde thob 'gyur // zhes bya ba la //
translated: One who desires happiness will attain happiness.

original: bde ba 'dod pa ste thar pa 'dod pas bde ba thob par 'gyur ba ste bskyod pas bde bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba 'dod pa ste thar pa 'dod pas bde ba thob par 'gyur ba ste bskyod pas bde bar bya ba'o //
translated: One who desires liberation, which is the desire for happiness, will attain happiness, which is the happiness of shaking off.

original: mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spangs gtsang //
analyzed: mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spangs gtsang //
translated: One should be pure, having abandoned the sacred thread.

original: zhes bya ba ni mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa rig byed dang tshes kyi bstan bcos las byung ba'i @59a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa rig byed dang tshes kyi bstan bcos las byung ba'i @59a * //
translated: One should abandon the sacred thread and so forth, which come from the Vedas and the treatises on astronomy.

original: gtsang sbra yongs su spang ba'o //üîΩshr'i he ru kas byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: gtsang sbra yongs su spang ba'o // shr'i he ru kas byin gyis brlabs //
translated: One should be pure, having abandoned the observances that come from the Vedas and the treatises on astronomy.

original: zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru kas byin gyis brlabs pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsang sbra la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru kas byin gyis brlabs pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsang sbra la spyad par bya'o //

original: phyag rgya lnga ni mgul rgyan dang gdu bu dang spyi bo'i nor bu dang / rna rgyan dang / mchod phyir thogs te lnga'o //

analyzed: dus kun du zhes bya ba ni de dang mi 'bral bar bya ba'o //

original: ral pa bcing ba la sogs pa mi bya ba dang / sogs pa'i sgras ni 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa gzhan dag yongs su spang bar ston to //
analyzed: ral pa bcing ba la sogs pa mi bya ba dang / sogs pa'i sgras ni 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa gzhan dag yongs su spang bar ston to //

analyzed: pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //

analyzed: bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i mchog gi don byed pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zas la spyod pas dam tshig spyod pa byas par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, by the conduct of eating, the conduct of the pledge is performed.

original: de yis dag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yis dag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that by that, one becomes pure.

original: gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya //
analyzed: gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa nyid yin no //

original: pho nya mo zhen rtag thar pa //
analyzed: pho nya mo zhen rtag thar pa //
translated: The messenger is always liberated through attachment.

original: zhes bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba'i gnas skabs su phyi rol gyi rnal 'byor pa la go cha chen po la sogs pas @59b go bskon par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba'i gnas skabs su phyi rol gyi rnal 'byor pa la go cha chen po la sogs pas @59b go bskon par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that at the stage of the Joyous, the external yogin should be armored with the great armor, etc.

original: 'da' ba yis kyang longs spyod bya //
analyzed: 'da' ba yis kyang longs spyod bya //
translated: One should enjoy even the forbidden.

original: zhes bya ba ni gal te shin tu legs par bslabs pa med na skal pa bzang por gyur ba de legs par sbyangs la longs spyad par bya'o //üîΩskye gnas dman la dga' gnas pa //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gal te shin tu legs par bslabs pa med na skal pa bzang por gyur ba de legs par sbyangs la longs spyad par bya'o // skye gnas dman la dga' gnas pa //
translated: The meaning is that if one is not well trained, then having trained well in that good fortune, one should enjoy it.

original: bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min //
translated: One should not serve one who delights in inferior birth.

original: zhes bya ba la skye gnas ni bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs te de gzung bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la skye gnas ni bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs te de gzung bar mi bya'o //
translated: Birth is the caste of brahmin, etc. One should not grasp that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: sbyor ba mchog gi snod ma yin pas de la gus pa ra mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sbyor ba mchog gi snod ma yin pas de la gus pa ra mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because they are not vessels for the supreme yoga, one should not respect them.

original: ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //

original: gang yang dag pa'i sbyor bas rjes su mthun par bya'o //
analyzed: gang yang dag pa'i sbyor bas rjes su mthun par bya'o //

original: gzhan na de dag dka' thub zad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan na de dag dka' thub zad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Otherwise, their austerities will be exhausted.

original: mchog dang tha ma lhan cig 'gugs //
analyzed: mchog dang tha ma lhan cig 'gugs //
translated: The supreme and the inferior are summoned together.

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i 'gugs pas zas la spyod na dam tshig gi spyod pa byas par 'gyur zhing de las dag par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don te the tshom mi bya'o //

translated: If one enjoys food by the summoning of peace, one performs the conduct of commitment and from that one becomes pure. One should not doubt this.

original: de ltar rdzas ni rnam des yin //
analyzed: de ltar rdzas ni rnam des yin //
translated: Thus, the substance is of that kind.

original: zhes bya ba ni don dam pa nyid kyis nges pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don dam pa nyid kyis nges pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the ultimate itself being ascertained.

analyzed: 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa don ji lta ba nyid do //
translated: As for world, etc., it is just as the meaning.

original: lan cig zas la spyod par byed //
analyzed: lan cig zas la spyod par byed //
translated: One enjoys food once.

original: ces bya ba ni dam tshig spyod pa rnams dang / zas lhan cig spyod na sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni dam tshig spyod pa rnams dang / zas lhan cig spyod na sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning: the adept who practices the commitments, and who practices together with the food, will attain power.

original: lhag ma ni don ji lta ba nyid do //
analyzed: lhag ma ni don ji lta ba nyid do //
translated: The rest is just as it is in the text.

original: ba lang sha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstan pa la shin tu gnod par byed pa gzhan dag rnam par gzhig pa ston to //
analyzed: ba lang sha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstan pa la shin tu gnod par byed pa gzhan dag rnam par gzhig pa ston to //
translated: The meaning of the verse beginning with ‚Äúcow flesh‚Äù is to show the destruction of others who are very harmful to the teaching.

original: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /

analyzed: kyis byin sreg bya'o //
translated: combined with the words ‚ÄúSo-and-so, die!‚Äù

analyzed: sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni rma bya'am khyim bya la sogs pa gsung ngo //

analyzed: de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyi zas //
translated: The food of the heroes is

analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //

translated: This is the mantra nature of the mantra, and the hero's mantra is the mantra of the hero, who is well trained in the tantra, and who is endowed with and possesses the external woman.

analyzed: sprul pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems nyid kyi gnas skabs so //

original: gzhan dag ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: de'i pho nya ni lha mo'o //
analyzed: de'i pho nya ni lha mo'o //
translated: His messenger is the goddess.

original: bzang po ni mchog go /
analyzed: bzang po ni mchog go /
translated: The good is the supreme.

original: // / brtson pa ni le lo med pa'o //
analyzed: // / brtson pa ni le lo med pa'o //
translated: The endeavor is the absence of laziness.

original: lhan cig ldan pa ni gzhan du mi 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: lhan cig ldan pa ni gzhan du mi 'gro ba'o //
translated: The conjoined is the non-going elsewhere.

original: de lta bu ni dngos grub kyi skal pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bu ni dngos grub kyi skal pa can du 'gyur ro //

original: ma chags dga' ba'i longs spyod rdzogs //
analyzed: ma chags dga' ba'i longs spyod rdzogs //
translated: The enjoyment of the passion of non-attachment

original: zhes bya ba ni tha mal pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba'i kun du sbyor ba'i nyon mongs par dmigs par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tha mal pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba'i kun du sbyor ba'i nyon mongs par dmigs par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam 'byed nyid //üîΩces bya ba la /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam 'byed nyid // ces bya ba la /

original: rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Yoga is meditative concentration.

original: rdzas ni bsrung bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdzas ni bsrung bar bya ba'o //
translated: Substances are those to be protected.

original: de'i rnam par 'byed pa ni bye brag 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam par 'byed pa ni bye brag 'byed pa'o //
translated: Their differentiation is the analysis.

original: yang na rnal 'byor ni 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rnal 'byor ni 'brel pa'o //

original: rdzas ni 'brel pa can te /
analyzed: rdzas ni 'brel pa can te /
translated: Substances are the connected ones.

original: de'i rnam par dbye ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i rnam par dbye ba nyid do //
translated: Their differentiation is just that.

original: ma yin zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ma yin zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: Not is the remainder of the sentence.

original: bla ma'i man ngag la dga' zhing //
analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag la dga' zhing //
translated: Delighting in the guru's instructions,

original: zhes bya ba ni bla ma la brgyud pa'i rim pa ma nyams pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bla ma la brgyud pa'i rim pa ma nyams pas so //

original: de yi don ni mchog tu mtshungs //
analyzed: de yi don ni mchog tu mtshungs //
translated: His meaning is supreme, equal.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ji skad gsungs pa'i don la spyod pa ni dpal he ru ka dang mtshungs par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ji skad gsungs pa'i don la spyod pa ni dpal he ru ka dang mtshungs par 'gyur pa'o //

original: le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o /

original: // / spun ni dpa' bo rnams so //
analyzed: // / spun ni dpa' bo rnams so //

original: pha ni shr'i he ru ka'o //
analyzed: pha ni shr'i he ru ka'o //
translated: The father is ≈örƒ´ Heruka.

original: bdag po nyid du skad cig mthong //
analyzed: bdag po nyid du skad cig mthong //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdag po kho nar skad cig gis mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: lce sbom zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi spyi thun mong du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩdran pa dang ni yang dag ldan //
analyzed: lce sbom zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi spyi thun mong du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // dran pa dang ni yang dag ldan //

original: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //üîΩpho nya la sogs gnas dang bcas //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o // pho nya la sogs gnas dang bcas //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par bslabs pas pho nya dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The messengers and so forth with their places means endowed with messengers through uninterrupted training.

analyzed: sogs pa'i @60b sgras ni bsrung bar bya ba dang / bza' bar bya ba bsdu ba'o //

analyzed: gnas dang bcas pa ni sngags de'i bsngags pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: With their places means with the praise of that mantra.

original: mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi //

analyzed: spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gtso bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni spyod pa dang grol ba'i 'bras bu rab tu ster bar 'gyur ro //

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //

original: ji srid dro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: ji srid dro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mtshon pa ste /

original: ting nge 'dzin la rnam pa thams cad du shin tu dmigs pa'i sbyor bas mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du drod dang / rtse mo dang / bzod pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung bar rtogs par bya ste /

translated: One should understand that heat, peak, forbearance, and the supreme mundane quality arise just as they are characterized by the practice of thoroughly observing meditative stabilization in every way.

original: dro bar bya zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis so //
analyzed: dro bar bya zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis so //

original: 'dod pa'i don kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //

original: le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o /

analyzed: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnod mdzes kyi sngags btub ston te /
translated: Then, etc. teaches the mantra of Sumbha-nIÃÑla-danda.

original: de nas rdza rnga'i bcing bya ste //
analyzed: de nas rdza rnga'i bcing bya ste //
translated: Then, one should bind the clay drum.

original: zhes bya bas rdza rnga lta bu'i dbyibs las re'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgur bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya bas rdza rnga lta bu'i dbyibs las re'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgur bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: re'u mig gsum pa ni nang gi re'u mig bzhi la ltos nas de skad smras pa yin no //

analyzed: de la aushma'i gsum pa yi ge sa'o //

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /

analyzed: rim bzhin 'byung dang rim min pas // dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pa pos //

original: zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so //

analyzed: re'u mig lnga pa yis zhes bya ba ni yi ge au'o //

analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba ni ka nas brtsams te nyi shu lnga pa'o //

analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa zhes bya ba nas yang de bzhin no //

analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug pa zhes bya ba ni aa nas brtsams te bgrang ba'o //

original: re'u mig gsum pa zhes bya ba yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: re'u mig gsum pa zhes bya ba yang de bzhin no //

original: de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //

original: re'u mig lnga pa zhes bya ba ni yi ge au'o //
analyzed: re'u mig lnga pa zhes bya ba ni yi ge au'o //

original: nyi shu lnga pa zhes bya ba ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: nyi shu lnga pa zhes bya ba ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //

original: nyi shu bzhi pa zhes bya ba yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: nyi shu bzhi pa zhes bya ba yang de bzhin no //

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa zhes bya ba ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa zhes bya ba ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //

original: bco lnga pa zhes bya ba ni aa nas brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: bco lnga pa zhes bya ba ni aa nas brtsams pa'o //

original: lnga pa zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pa'o //
analyzed: lnga pa zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pa'o //

original: nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //
translated: The twenty-second is the letter Ka.

analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bdun pa zhes bya ba ni aa nas brtsams pa ste /
translated: The twenty-seventh is the letter A.

original: sngags 'di dag ni @61a * //
analyzed: sngags 'di dag ni @61a * //
translated: These are the first words of the mantras.

original: tshig dang po yin no //
analyzed: tshig dang po yin no //
translated: The first word is

analyzed: aa nas brtsams pa'i yi ge ga ni bcu dgu pa yin no //
translated: the letter Ga, which is the nineteenth, beginning with A.

original: me'i bu ni yi ge ra'o //
analyzed: me'i bu ni yi ge ra'o //
translated: The son of Fire is the letter Ra.

original: re'u mig gsum pa ni yi ge ai'o //
analyzed: re'u mig gsum pa ni yi ge ai'o //

original: ya tshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: ya tshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //

analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te yi ge na'o //

original: slar yang zhes bya ba ni yi ge gnyis po dag nyid de dang sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: slar yang zhes bya ba ni yi ge gnyis po dag nyid de dang sbyar ba'o //

original: rang byung zhes bya ba ni yi ge ha'o //
analyzed: rang byung zhes bya ba ni yi ge ha'o //

original: re'u mig lnga pa zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi re'u mig lnga pa'o //
analyzed: re'u mig lnga pa zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi re'u mig lnga pa'o //

original: bin du zhes bya ba ni thig le'o //
analyzed: bin du zhes bya ba ni thig le'o //

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te tshig gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te tshig gnyis pa'o //

original: bcu dgu pa ni snga ma bzhin te ga'o //
analyzed: bcu dgu pa ni snga ma bzhin te ga'o //

original: nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //
translated: The twenty-seventh is beginning with ka.

original: gsum pa ni dbyangs yig gi yi ge gsum pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni dbyangs yig gi yi ge gsum pa'o //

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i snga ma yi ge ha'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i snga ma yi ge ha'o //
translated: The thirty-third is the syllable ha before.

original: re'u mig gnyis pa ni yi ge a'a'o //
analyzed: re'u mig gnyis pa ni yi ge a'a'o //
translated: The second square is the syllable a.

original: nyi shu ba ni ka nas brtsams pa ste na nyid de /
analyzed: nyi shu ba ni ka nas brtsams pa ste na nyid de /
translated: The twentieth is beginning with ka.

original: de nyid ni ra dang ha'i dbang gis na de nar 'gyur te gri ha'i sgra'i 'og tu gnas pa'i na ni nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni ra dang ha'i dbang gis na de nar 'gyur te gri ha'i sgra'i 'og tu gnas pa'i na ni nar 'gyur ro //
translated: That itself, by the power of ra and ha, becomes na. The na below the word griha becomes na.

original: nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ni ka nas brtsams pa ste pa'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ni ka nas brtsams pa ste pa'o //

original: nyi shu rtsa drug pa ni ka nas brtsams pa ste ya'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa drug pa ni ka nas brtsams pa ste ya'o //
translated: The twenty-sixth is from ka, ya.

analyzed: lan gnyis bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni lan gnyis zlos shing goms par bya ba ste snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The second repetition is the second repetition, the second practice, as before.

original: re'u mig lugs las bzlog pa'i tshul gyi dang por yi ge ha'o //
analyzed: re'u mig lugs las bzlog pa'i tshul gyi dang por yi ge ha'o //
translated: The first letter is ha, in the reverse order of the squares.

original: bzhi pa ni ai ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa ni ai ste /
translated: The fourth is i.

original: de'i mtha' ni au'o //
analyzed: de'i mtha' ni au'o //
translated: Its end is u.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: da ni tshig bzhi pa btu ba gsungs pa ni re'u mig gnyis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni tshig bzhi pa btu ba gsungs pa ni re'u mig gnyis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /

original: dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po'i re'u mig nas brtsams pa aa'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po'i re'u mig nas brtsams pa aa'o //

original: sum cu rtsa drug pa ni aa nas brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug pa ni aa nas brtsams pa'o //

original: nyi shu rtsa drug pa ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa drug pa ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //
translated: The twenty-sixth is from ka.

original: sum cu gsum pa zhes bya ba ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: sum cu gsum pa zhes bya ba ni ka nas brtsams pa'o //
translated: The thirty-third is from ka.

original: de bzhin du bcu gsum pa ni dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bcu gsum pa ni dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum pa'o //

analyzed: re'u mig bcu pa ni ha la sogs pa nas go bzlog pa'i tshul gyis brtsis pa'i yi ge bha ni re'u mig bcu pa'o //
translated: The tenth square is the letter Bha, which is counted in the reverse order from Ha and so on.

original: bcu dgu pa ni aa nas brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: bcu dgu pa ni aa nas brtsams pa'o //
translated: The nineteenth is the letter A.

original: gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni re'u mig gnyis las dbyangs kyi yi ge'i re'u mig gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni re'u mig gnyis las dbyangs kyi yi ge'i re'u mig gnyis pa'o //

original: thig le zhes bya ba ni sa steng nas aa nu sva ra dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: thig le zhes bya ba ni sa steng nas aa nu sva ra dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The drop is the letter Sa, endowed with anusvara.

original: chu zhes bya ba ni yi ge bha'o //
analyzed: chu zhes bya ba ni yi ge bha'o //
translated: The water is the letter Bha.

original: brgyad pa ni yi ge dza'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa ni yi ge dza'o //

original: me yi bu yis khyad par dbye //
analyzed: me yi bu yis khyad par dbye //

original: zhes bya ba ni @61b yi ge ras bye brag 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni @61b yi ge ras bye brag 'byed pa'o //

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //

original: de dag ni rtsa ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: de dag ni rtsa ba'i sngags so //

original: khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi tshig bzhis mtshan ma smos pa'i khro bo bzhi bshad pa yin no //

original: sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru //
analyzed: sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa gzugs brgyad kyi tshul du sngags 'di gnas pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang //
analyzed: 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang //
translated: Even by just obtaining this,

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags des tshar bcad pa de 'ching bar 'gyur ba'o //

original: le'u sum cu pa'o /
analyzed: le'u sum cu pa'o /
translated: CHAPTER XXX

original: // / sha chen zhes bya ba ni sngar bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: // / sha chen zhes bya ba ni sngar bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o //

original: zangs ma'i gtsug phud can zhes bya ba ni khyim bya'o //
analyzed: zangs ma'i gtsug phud can zhes bya ba ni khyim bya'o //

original: dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can //
analyzed: dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can //

original: zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas //

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i cha byad sngar ma bshad pa ni bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i cha byad sngar ma bshad pa ni bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the previously unexplained bodily ornaments of the Blessed One.

original: brda ni lnga po bstan pa dag / ces bya ba 'dir brda'i sgra ni rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa lha mo lnga la bya ba yin te /
analyzed: brda ni lnga po bstan pa dag / ces bya ba 'dir brda'i sgra ni rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa lha mo lnga la bya ba yin te /
translated: The five signs that are taught are the five goddesses such as VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´, because the word sign is used for them.

original: ral pa dang cod pa na brgyan pa'i thod pa chen po lnga lha mo lngar bstan cing bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ral pa dang cod pa na brgyan pa'i thod pa chen po lnga lha mo lngar bstan cing bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should visualize and contemplate the five great skulls adorned with locks of hair and diadems as the five goddesses.

original: sgrub pa po'i lag g-yon gyis //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i lag g-yon gyis //

original: zhes bya ba ni bza' ba dang bca' ba gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad kyang dam tshig can la ster ba na sgrub pa pos lag pa g-yon pas sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bza' ba dang bca' ba gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad kyang dam tshig can la ster ba na sgrub pa pos lag pa g-yon pas sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means that whatever food and drink there is, all of that is given to the one who has the commitments. The adept should give with his left hand.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lag pa'i mchod pa ston to //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bor bzhugs // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Vajrasattva resides in the thumb.

original: bzhugs zhes bya ba thams cad la sbyar ro //
analyzed: bzhugs zhes bya ba thams cad la sbyar ro //

analyzed: ta la ni mdzub mo ste rnam par snang mdzad do //

original: gu ra be zhes bya ba ni gung mo'o //
analyzed: gu ra be zhes bya ba ni gung mo'o //

original: padma gar zhes bya ba ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: padma gar zhes bya ba ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //

analyzed: da ra zhes bya ba ni srin lag go //

analyzed: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru ka'o //

original: ta nu zhes bya ba ni mthe'u chung ngo //

original: mi zad ces bya ba ni de'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: mi zad ces bya ba ni de'i khyad par ro //

original: nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'o //

analyzed: sen mo zhes bya ba ni sor mo thams cad kyi sen mo'i bar na gnas pa'i rta mgrin no //

original: g-yon pa las byung rgyu yin no //
analyzed: g-yon pa las byung rgyu yin no //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'di dag ni lag pa g-yon par bstan cing lha gnas pa'i rgyu yin no // lag mthil zhes bya ba la lag mthil du padma 'dab ma lnga pa bsams la /
translated: These are the causes of the deities who are taught in the left hand.üîΩThe palm is the one who is in the palm.

original: padma'i ge sar la pho nya mo @62a * //
analyzed: padma'i ge sar la pho nya mo @62a * //
translated: Having imagined a five-petaled lotus in the palm,üîΩon the lotus stamen is the messenger.

original: rnams las rdo rje phag mo'o //
analyzed: rnams las rdo rje phag mo'o //

original: mdun du ya ma ni /
analyzed: mdun du ya ma ni /
translated: Yama is in front.

original: g-yon du mo ha ni /
analyzed: g-yon du mo ha ni /

original: rgyab tu sany+tsa ri ni //üîΩg-yas su skrag byed ma'o //
analyzed: rgyab tu sany+tsa ri ni // g-yas su skrag byed ma'o //
translated: Sancari is in back.üîΩBhima is on the right.

original: tsandi ka ni snyoms par 'jug pa la spro ba ste /
analyzed: tsandi ka ni snyoms par 'jug pa la spro ba ste /
translated: Candali is the one who delights in union.

original: rang bdag nyid bsam pa gcig pa'o //
analyzed: rang bdag nyid bsam pa gcig pa'o //
translated: She is the one who is intent on her own self.

original: rgyab tu shin tu nges byas te //
analyzed: rgyab tu shin tu nges byas te //
translated: Having made it very firm in the back,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is what is being said:

analyzed: lag pa'i mthil du sngags kyi sa bon gyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang / rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa lha mo rnams dgod par bstan mod kyi //

analyzed: 'on kyang lag pa'i rgyab tu me long gi nang du gzugs brnyan snang ba ltar nges par bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de nyid kyis na mkhas pas rgyab tu bskyed ces bshad pa yin no //

original: sgrub pa pos brda rnam pa lnga bstan par bya ba las //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos brda rnam pa lnga bstan par bya ba las //

original: lnga zhes bya ba smos pa ni 'dir lag pa'i mchod pa'i skabs su brda lnga zhes bya ba ni dri chen dang dri chu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lnga zhes bya ba smos pa ni 'dir lag pa'i mchod pa'i skabs su brda lnga zhes bya ba ni dri chen dang dri chu la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: spyan la sogs pa smos pa ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi la bya'o //

original: stong pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings so //
analyzed: stong pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings so //
translated: The void is the realm of space.

original: dbus su zhes bya ba yang de nyid do //
analyzed: dbus su zhes bya ba yang de nyid do //

analyzed: de ltar brda yis dpa' bo rnams //

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i mchod pa la dung chen po la gnas pa'i rdzas kyis dpa' bo 'khor lo sdom pa brda yis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i mchod pa la dung chen po la gnas pa'i rdzas kyis dpa' bo 'khor lo sdom pa brda yis mchod par bya'o //
translated: This is the worship with the substances located in the great conch of the hero Cakrasa·πÉvara‚Äôs hand.

original: de nas zas la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zas la spyad par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should enjoy the food.

original: 'di ltar byas pas dpa' bo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar byas pas dpa' bo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: By doing it this way, one will become the supreme hero, the hero who is united with all heroes, the dakini JƒÅlinƒ´prabha.

original: le'u sum cu gcig pa'o /
analyzed: le'u sum cu gcig pa'o /
translated: The thirty-first chapter.

original: // / phyugs dgug pa ni sgrub pa pos sngar gyi cho gas byed de //
analyzed: // / phyugs dgug pa ni sgrub pa pos sngar gyi cho gas byed de //

original: phyugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la //üîΩsen mo lnga rnams ni khyi dang / byi la dang / ri bong la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: phyugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la // sen mo lnga rnams ni khyi dang / byi la dang / ri bong la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThe victim,‚Äù etc.üîΩThe five nails are the dog, the cat, the rabbit, etc.

original: sen mo lnga'i rigs so //üîΩrigs rnams kyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sen mo lnga'i rigs so // rigs rnams kyis zhes bya ba la /

original: rgyal rigs la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi rnams kyi nang nas bsngags pa ni phyugs so //
analyzed: rgyal rigs la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi rnams kyi nang nas bsngags pa ni phyugs so //
translated: Among the types, the one praised is the victim.

original: dpa' bo ni mang po rnams gang gis bsad pa de ni phyugs dpa' bo'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo ni mang po rnams gang gis bsad pa de ni phyugs dpa' bo'o //
translated: The hero is the one who kills many heroes, and he is the hero's beast.

original: he ru kas byas pa mthong ba yang ngo //
analyzed: he ru kas byas pa mthong ba yang ngo //
translated: The one who sees what is done by Heruka is also [the hero's beast].

original: dud 'gro rnams las dud 'gro mngal du skyes pa rnams dud 'gro 'gro ba'i phyugs te /
analyzed: dud 'gro rnams las dud 'gro mngal du skyes pa rnams dud 'gro 'gro ba'i phyugs te /
translated: Among the animals, those born from wombs are the beasts of the animal realm.

original: sbrul rin po che dang ldan pa'i phyugs so //
analyzed: sbrul rin po che dang ldan pa'i phyugs so //
translated: The beast with the precious snake is [the beast of the snake].

original: phyugs 'di ni lha rnams kyi bde bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyugs 'di ni lha rnams kyi bde bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: This beast will accomplish the bliss of the gods.

original: khva la sogs pa ce spyad la thug @62b pa rnams dang / bya'i bye brag rnams sbyin sreg dang gtor ma la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: khva la sogs pa ce spyad la thug @62b pa rnams dang / bya'i bye brag rnams sbyin sreg dang gtor ma la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: sbyin sreg ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg nyid do //
analyzed: sbyin sreg ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg nyid do //

original: da ni ro langs sgrub pa bshad pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni ro langs sgrub pa bshad pa smos pa yin te /
translated: Now, it is said that the zombie practice is explained.

original: nag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In black and so on,

original: dang po kho nar gnod mdzes kyi sngags sam rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /
analyzed: dang po kho nar gnod mdzes kyi sngags sam rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /

original: mtshan ma thob pa'i sngags pas dur khrod du ro ma smas shing nyams pa med pa btsal la nam phyed na aa sha na nag po dang / m'a n'a nag po dang / 'bras nag po dang ldan pa'i sbyin sreg byas la /
analyzed: mtshan ma thob pa'i sngags pas dur khrod du ro ma smas shing nyams pa med pa btsal la nam phyed na aa sha na nag po dang / m'a n'a nag po dang / 'bras nag po dang ldan pa'i sbyin sreg byas la /
translated: The mantrin who has attained the signs, having sought out in the charnel ground a corpse that is not damaged or decayed, at midnight should make a burnt offering with black sesame, black mustard seed, and black beans.

original: de yang 'dzem pa med par ro'i khar zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de yang 'dzem pa med par ro'i khar zhes bya ba la /
translated: And also, without hesitation, in the mouth of the corpse,

analyzed: sngags pas rang gi rnal 'byor mngon sum du byas su zin yang rang bsrung dang go cha chen po la sogs pas bsrung bdag kyang byas la /
translated: means that even though the mantrin has made his yoga manifest, he should also perform protection by means of self-protection, the great armor, and so on.

original: 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i 'dzem pa mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i 'dzem pa mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should not be fearful and hesitant.

original: yi dags chen po 'jigs pa'i bdag nyid can mi sdug pa mthong na 'jigs par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yi dags chen po 'jigs pa'i bdag nyid can mi sdug pa mthong na 'jigs par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should not be afraid when seeing a great ghost with a terrifying nature and an ugly appearance.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: lci ba'i thal ba ni thal ba'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: lci ba'i thal ba ni thal ba'i khyad par ro //
translated: The heavy ash is a special ash.

original: mgo bo skam zhes bya ba ni grags pa ste /
analyzed: mgo bo skam zhes bya ba ni grags pa ste /

original: chag grugs med pa blangs la dung chen po bya ba 'am /
analyzed: chag grugs med pa blangs la dung chen po bya ba 'am /
translated: Taking it without a flaw, it is called a great conch.

original: yang na thod pa rus sbal gyi thod pa las bya'o //
analyzed: yang na thod pa rus sbal gyi thod pa las bya'o //
translated: Or else, the skull is made from the skull of a tortoise.

original: phyag bzhi pa la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i phyag rgya chen po ston te /
analyzed: phyag bzhi pa la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i phyag rgya chen po ston te /
translated: The four-armed and so forth show the great seal of Bhagavat Heruka.

analyzed: de dag thams cad ni sgrub pa'i thabs su rgya cher bstan pa yin no //
translated: All of these are taught extensively in the means of achievement.

original: de yi sku mdog mtshon cha 'chang //
analyzed: de yi sku mdog mtshon cha 'chang //
translated: His body color and weapon-holding

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: means that one who holds the body color and hand implements of that Bhagavat is called that.

analyzed: sku mdog sngo la phyag mtshan rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he is blue-colored and holds a vajra.

original: 'dis phyag mtshan zhes bya ba spyi'i tshig smos su zin kyang phyag mtshan gyi gtso bor gyur pa yin pas rdo rje kho na la bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis phyag mtshan zhes bya ba spyi'i tshig smos su zin kyang phyag mtshan gyi gtso bor gyur pa yin pas rdo rje kho na la bya'o //
translated: Although this mentions the general term ‚Äúhand implement,‚Äù since it is the chief hand implement, it refers only to the vajra.

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha du ma bsnams su zin kyang /
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha du ma bsnams su zin kyang /
translated: Moreover, although the Bhagavat holds many weapons,

original: rdo rje 'dzin zhes mtshan gsol ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin zhes mtshan gsol ba yin no //
translated: is called Vajradhara.

original: phyag rgya yis ni sku la brgyan //
analyzed: phyag rgya yis ni sku la brgyan //

original: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa la bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa la bya'o //

original: yi dags chen po gdan du byas //
analyzed: yi dags chen po gdan du byas //

original: zhes bya ba ni yi dags gyi bdag po mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yi dags gyi bdag po mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
translated: This means that he sits on the ghost lord.

original: de bas rtag tu sgrub pa pos //
analyzed: de bas rtag tu sgrub pa pos //
translated: Therefore, the practitioner

original: sngags kyi lha ni shes par bsgom //üîΩzhes pa ni rnal 'byor chen po @63a * //
analyzed: sngags kyi lha ni shes par bsgom // zhes pa ni rnal 'byor chen po @63a * //
translated: always meditates on the mantra deity.

original: po la dmigs pa med par sngags bzlas pa mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: po la dmigs pa med par sngags bzlas pa mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that in the great yoga one should not recite the mantra without a focus.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: le'u sum cu gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: le'u sum cu gnyis pa'o /
translated: The thirty-second chapter.

original: // / med par gyur kyang bza' ba ni //
analyzed: // / med par gyur kyang bza' ba ni //
translated: Even if the five are not available,

original: lnga pa nyid du bya ba yin //
analyzed: lnga pa nyid du bya ba yin //
translated: they should be made into the five.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe rjes su mthun pa'i bdud rtsi lnga med par gyur na de'i tshe bza' ba gang dag yin pa bdud rtsi lnga bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe rjes su mthun pa'i bdud rtsi lnga med par gyur na de'i tshe bza' ba gang dag yin pa bdud rtsi lnga bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that when the five nectars are not available, one should imagine that whatever food one eats is the five nectars.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: dpa' bo rnams kyi stan dag dang // phyag rgya ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams kyi stan dag dang // phyag rgya ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The seats of the heroes and the seals are the remainder.

analyzed: shin tu mnyam gzhag ces bya ba ni tha mal pa'i nga rgyal spangs pa'o //
translated: Very equipoised means abandoning ordinary pride.

original: de'i 'og tu dpa' bo yi //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dpa' bo yi //
translated: Then, the hero

original: dpa' bo kun du spyad par bya //
analyzed: dpa' bo kun du spyad par bya //
translated: should practice the hero.

original: zhes bya ba ni re zhig dang por ji skad bshad pa'i lha mo'i mchod pa phul du byung ba bsgrubs shing nyams su blangs la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni re zhig dang por ji skad bshad pa'i lha mo'i mchod pa phul du byung ba bsgrubs shing nyams su blangs la /

original: de'i 'og tu dpa' bo'i dpa' bo ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dpa' bo'i dpa' bo ste /
translated: Then, the hero of the hero,

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa kun du spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa kun du spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that is, the great seal, and so on, should be practiced.

original: le'u sum cu gsum pa'o /üîΩ// / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid bya ba'am /
analyzed: le'u sum cu gsum pa'o / // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid bya ba'am /
translated: Chapter Thirty-Three

original: 'khor lo gsum mchod par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum mchod par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Then, and so on and so forth means that one should practice the three wheels, or worship the three wheels.

original: cha'i rtsibs zhes bya ba ni cha'i yan lag ste /
analyzed: cha'i rtsibs zhes bya ba ni cha'i yan lag ste /

analyzed: de cha yang yin la rtsibs kyang yin pas cha'i yan lag ste /

analyzed: de ni dpa' bo ste rigs la ltos nas gcig gi tshig gis bstan to //

original: padma'i lte ba zhes bya ba mang po'i tshig ni de blang bar bya ba'i gnas yin pas de la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: padma'i lte ba zhes bya ba mang po'i tshig ni de blang bar bya ba'i gnas yin pas de la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //

original: aa wa dd'u t'i'i gnas de bzhin //
analyzed: aa wa dd'u t'i'i gnas de bzhin //
translated: The place of the avadh≈´tƒ´

original: smin ma'i bar du nges par bzhag //
analyzed: smin ma'i bar du nges par bzhag //

analyzed: ces bya ba ni dpral ba'i rdo rje phreng ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis aa wa dd'u t'i zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i gnas su bya ba ste /

original: de ni mi zad pa'i spyan te /
analyzed: de ni mi zad pa'i spyan te /

analyzed: de smin ma'i bar du zhes bya ba ni dpral ba'i dbus su gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúBetween the eyebrows‚Äù means in the middle of the forehead.

original: dpa' bo 'chol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg ston te /
analyzed: dpa' bo 'chol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg ston te /

original: dpa' bo he ru ka'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang 'chol bar byas shing khro bor bsgyur ba'i gnas skabs kyis 'og nas smos pa ji ltar rnyed pa'i sha yis sbyin sreg bya ba 'am /
analyzed: dpa' bo he ru ka'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang 'chol bar byas shing khro bor bsgyur ba'i gnas skabs kyis 'og nas smos pa ji ltar rnyed pa'i sha yis sbyin sreg bya ba 'am /

original: yang na bdag nyid khro bo'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas ji snyed pa'i sha'i sbyor bas tshim @63b par byas la /
analyzed: yang na bdag nyid khro bo'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas ji snyed pa'i sha'i sbyor bas tshim @63b par byas la /

analyzed: de'i 'og tu las dang rjes su mthun pa'i go m'am sa dang khrag gis sbyin sreg lnga nyid du bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Then, after that, one should make a burnt offering of the ashes or of earth and blood, five times in accordance with the rite.

analyzed: 'bang bas zhes bya ba ni lha'i nga rgyal gyis ma yengs par de nas sbyin sreg dgu bya ba'o //

analyzed: 'bar ba'i me la zhes bya ba ni shin tu 'bar ba'i me la yam shing la sogs pa ji ltar las mthun pas 'bul ba'o //
translated: In the blazing fire means that one should offer the firewood and so forth in a very blazing fire, in accordance with the rite.

analyzed: de ltar me lha'i zhal du sbyin sreg phul nas /

analyzed: kun nas 'khor lo bsam zhes bya ba ni thab kyi dbus su 'khor lo gsum po de gzhal yas khang ra ba dang bcas pa dang / rang gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o //

translated: Kha·πá·∏çarohƒÅ means that Kha·πá·∏çarohƒÅ, who resides on the back side, should be brought forth from one's own body in the same way, in accordance with one's karma, and placed externally as another Kha·πá·∏çarohƒÅ.

original: las thams cad 'grub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: las thams cad 'grub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: de nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir //

original: rang gi gzugs su mngon zhen pa //
analyzed: rang gi gzugs su mngon zhen pa //

original: zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin no //

original: 'khor lo 'di dag bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'khor lo 'di dag bstan pa ni /

original: rim pa ji bzhin bya ba yin //
analyzed: rim pa ji bzhin bya ba yin //

analyzed: de yang zhi ba la sogs pa'i cho ga'i rim pa dang mi 'gal bar bya'o //

analyzed: yang na rig pa'i rgya mtsho ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg la sogs pa rgyas par bstan pa yin la /

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //

original: le'u sum cu bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: le'u sum cu bzhi pa'o /

analyzed: phan tshun sbyar ba'i gsang sngags ni //

original: 'jug pa'i tshul gyis bya ba ste /

translated: This means that in the case of the activity of subduing the wicked, the syllable H≈™·πÄ is applied at the beginning, middle, and end.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro'o //

analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /

original: de ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de ni go sla'o //

analyzed: kha sbyar sbyar bar gyur pa dang // zhes bya ba ni sngags sgra la sogs par bshad pa'i tshul gyis te /

analyzed: aom lha sbyin sv'a h'a aom zhes bya ba lta bu'o //

original: rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pas //
analyzed: rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pas //

analyzed: rdo rje dbye ba nyid dang ni //

translated: This means that when one is engaged in the rite of subduing the wicked, then one should split apart and destroy that very vajra, that is, the syllable H≈™·πÄ, because the kiss is the rite for all activities.

analyzed: lcags kyu nyid kyis dgug pa dang // zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe 'gugs par 'dod pa de'i tshe //

analyzed: lo ma'i tshul du sngags spel la /

analyzed: rdo rje yis ni bza' bar bya //

analyzed: dbug la mda' yis sbyar bar bya //

analyzed: dus min 'chi ba las rgyal nyid //

analyzed: mchod pa'i khyad par 'di dag thams cad kyis khanda ro h'a khyad par du phye ba yin no //
translated: By all these special offerings, Kha·πá·∏çarohƒÅ is distinguished.

original: thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni //
analyzed: thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni //
translated: In the skull-cup offering vessel,

original: zhal du mchod yon nges par sbyar //üîΩzhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang bas khanda ro h'a'i zhal du aargha phul la mtshon cha dang sbyar bar bya ste /

analyzed: sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba dang 'dra ba bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: le'u sum cu lnga pa'o /
analyzed: le'u sum cu lnga pa'o /

original: // / phyag rgya rengs pa'i las kyis ni //
analyzed: // / phyag rgya rengs pa'i las kyis ni //

analyzed: las ni 'bad pa nyid kyis bya //
